145 QString DocumentPrivate::pagesSizeString() const
146 {
147  if (m_generator)
148  {
149  if (m_generator->pagesSizeMetric() != Generator::None)
150  {
151  QSizeF size = m_parent->allPagesSize();
152  if (size.isValid()) return localizedSize(size);
153  else return QString();
154  }
155  else return QString();
156  }
157  else return QString();
158 }

160 QString DocumentPrivate::namePaperSize(double inchesWidth, double inchesHeight) const
161 {
162  // Account for small deviations in paper sizes
163  static const double marginFactor = 0.03;
164  static const double lowerBoundFactor = 1.0 - marginFactor;
165  static const double upperBoundFactor = 1.0 + marginFactor;
166 
167  const QPrinter::Orientation orientation = inchesWidth > inchesHeight ? QPrinter::Landscape : QPrinter::Portrait;
168  // enforce portrait mode for further tests
169  if (inchesWidth > inchesHeight)
170  qSwap(inchesWidth, inchesHeight);
171 
172  // Use QPrinter to find which of the predefined paper sizes
173  // matches best the given paper width and height
174  QPrinter dummyPrinter;
175  QPrinter::PaperSize paperSize = QPrinter::Custom;
176  for (int i = 0; i < (int)QPrinter::NPaperSize; ++i)
177  {
178  const QPrinter::PaperSize ps = (QPrinter::PaperSize)i;
179  dummyPrinter.setPaperSize(ps);
180  const QSizeF definedPaperSize = dummyPrinter.paperSize(QPrinter::Inch);
181 
182  if (inchesWidth > definedPaperSize.width() * lowerBoundFactor && inchesWidth < definedPaperSize.width() * upperBoundFactor
183  && inchesHeight > definedPaperSize.height() * lowerBoundFactor && inchesHeight < definedPaperSize.height() * upperBoundFactor)
184  {
185  paperSize = ps;
186  break;
187  }
188  }
189 
190  // Handle all paper sizes defined in QPrinter,
191  // return string depending if paper's orientation is landscape or portrait
192  switch (paperSize) {
193  case QPrinter::A0:
194  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO A0") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO A0");
195  case QPrinter::A1:
196  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO A1") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO A1");
197  case QPrinter::A2:
198  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO A2") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO A2");
199  case QPrinter::A3:
200  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO A3") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO A3");
201  case QPrinter::A4:
202  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO A4") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO A4");
203  case QPrinter::A5:
204  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO A5") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO A5");
205  case QPrinter::A6:
206  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO A6") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO A6");
207  case QPrinter::A7:
208  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO A7") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO A7");
209  case QPrinter::A8:
210  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO A8") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO A8");
211  case QPrinter::A9:
212  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO A9") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO A9");
213  case QPrinter::B0:
214  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B0") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B0");
215  case QPrinter::B1:
216  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B1") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B1");
217  case QPrinter::B2:
218  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B2") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B2");
219  case QPrinter::B3:
220  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B3") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B3");
221  case QPrinter::B4:
222  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B4") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B4");
223  case QPrinter::B5:
224  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B5") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B5");
225  case QPrinter::B6:
226  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B6") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B6");
227  case QPrinter::B7:
228  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B7") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B7");
229  case QPrinter::B8:
230  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B8") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B8");
231  case QPrinter::B9:
232  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B9") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B9");
233  case QPrinter::B10:
234  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DIN/ISO B10") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DIN/ISO B10");
235  case QPrinter::Letter:
236  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape letter") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait letter");
237  case QPrinter::Legal:
238  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape legal") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait legal");
239  case QPrinter::Executive:
240  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape executive") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait executive");
241  case QPrinter::C5E:
242  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape C5E") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait C5E");
243  case QPrinter::Comm10E:
244  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape Comm10E") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait Comm10E");
245  case QPrinter::DLE:
246  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape DLE") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait DLE");
247  case QPrinter::Folio:
248  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "landscape folio") : i18nc("paper size", "portrait folio");
249  case QPrinter::Tabloid:
250  case QPrinter::Ledger:
252  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "ledger") : i18nc("paper size", "tabloid");
253  case QPrinter::Custom:
254  return orientation == QPrinter::Landscape ? i18nc("paper size", "unknown landscape paper size") : i18nc("paper size", "unknown portrait paper size");
255  }
256 
257  kWarning() << "PaperSize" << paperSize << "has not been covered";
258  return QString();
259 }

261 QString DocumentPrivate::localizedSize(const QSizeF &size) const
262 {
263  double inchesWidth = 0, inchesHeight = 0;
264  switch (m_generator->pagesSizeMetric())
265  {
266  case Generator::Points:
267  inchesWidth = size.width() / 72.0;
268  inchesHeight = size.height() / 72.0;
269  break;
270 
271  case Generator::Pixels:
272  {
273  const QSizeF dpi = m_generator->dpi();
274  inchesWidth = size.width() / dpi.width();
275  inchesHeight = size.height() / dpi.height();
276  }
277  break;
278 
279  case Generator::None:
280  break;
281  }
282  if (KGlobal::locale()->measureSystem() == KLocale::Imperial)
283  {
284  return i18nc("%1 is width, %2 is height, %3 is paper size name", "%1 x %2 in (%3)", inchesWidth, inchesHeight, namePaperSize(inchesWidth, inchesHeight));
285  }
286  else
287  {
288  return i18nc("%1 is width, %2 is height, %3 is paper size name", "%1 x %2 mm (%3)", QString::number(inchesWidth * 25.4, 'd', 0), QString::number(inchesHeight * 25.4, 'd', 0), namePaperSize(inchesWidth, inchesHeight));
289  }
290 }

292 qulonglong DocumentPrivate::calculateMemoryToFree()
293 {
294  // [MEM] choose memory parameters based on configuration profile
295  qulonglong clipValue = 0;
296  qulonglong memoryToFree = 0;
297 
298  switch ( SettingsCore::memoryLevel() )
299  {
300  case SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Low:
301  memoryToFree = m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory;
302  break;
303 
304  case SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Normal:
305  {
306  qulonglong thirdTotalMemory = getTotalMemory() / 3;
307  qulonglong freeMemory = getFreeMemory();
308  if (m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory > thirdTotalMemory) memoryToFree = m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory - thirdTotalMemory;
309  if (m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory > freeMemory) clipValue = (m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory - freeMemory) / 2;
310  }
311  break;
312 
313  case SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Aggressive:
314  {
315  qulonglong freeMemory = getFreeMemory();
316  if (m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory > freeMemory) clipValue = (m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory - freeMemory) / 2;
317  }
318  break;
319  case SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Greedy:
320  {
321  qulonglong freeSwap;
322  qulonglong freeMemory = getFreeMemory( &freeSwap );
323  const qulonglong memoryLimit = qMin( qMax( freeMemory, getTotalMemory()/2 ), freeMemory+freeSwap );
324  if (m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory > memoryLimit) clipValue = (m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory - memoryLimit) / 2;
325  }
326  break;
327  }
328 
329  if ( clipValue > memoryToFree )
330  memoryToFree = clipValue;
331 
332  return memoryToFree;
333 }
334 
335 void DocumentPrivate::cleanupPixmapMemory()
336 {
337  cleanupPixmapMemory( calculateMemoryToFree() );
338 }
339 
340 void DocumentPrivate::cleanupPixmapMemory( qulonglong memoryToFree )
341 {
342  if ( memoryToFree < 1 )
343  return;
344 
345  const int currentViewportPage = (*m_viewportIterator).pageNumber;
346 
347  // Create a QMap of visible rects, indexed by page number
348  QMap< int, VisiblePageRect * > visibleRects;
349  QVector< Okular::VisiblePageRect * >::const_iterator vIt = m_pageRects.constBegin(), vEnd = m_pageRects.constEnd();
350  for ( ; vIt != vEnd; ++vIt )
351  visibleRects.insert( (*vIt)->pageNumber, (*vIt) );
352 
353  // Free memory starting from pages that are farthest from the current one
354  int pagesFreed = 0;
355  while ( memoryToFree > 0 )
356  {
357  AllocatedPixmap * p = searchLowestPriorityPixmap( true, true );
358  if ( !p ) // No pixmap to remove
359  break;
360 
361  kDebug().nospace() << "Evicting cache pixmap observer=" << p->observer << " page=" << p->page;
362 
363  // m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory can't underflow because we always add or remove
364  // the memory used by the AllocatedPixmap so at most it can reach zero
365  m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory -= p->memory;
366  // Make sure memoryToFree does not underflow
367  if ( p->memory > memoryToFree )
368  memoryToFree = 0;
369  else
370  memoryToFree -= p->memory;
371  pagesFreed++;
372  // delete pixmap
373  m_pagesVector.at( p->page )->deletePixmap( p->observer );
374  // delete allocation descriptor
375  delete p;
376  }
377 
378  // If we're still on low memory, try to free individual tiles
379 
380  // Store pages that weren't completely removed
381 
382  QLinkedList< AllocatedPixmap * > pixmapsToKeep;
383  while (memoryToFree > 0)
384  {
385  int clean_hits = 0;
386  foreach (DocumentObserver *observer, m_observers)
387  {
388  AllocatedPixmap * p = searchLowestPriorityPixmap( false, true, observer );
389  if ( !p ) // No pixmap to remove
390  continue;
391 
392  clean_hits++;
393 
394  TilesManager *tilesManager = m_pagesVector.at( p->page )->d->tilesManager( observer );
395  if ( tilesManager && tilesManager->totalMemory() > 0 )
396  {
397  qulonglong memoryDiff = p->memory;
398  NormalizedRect visibleRect;
399  if ( visibleRects.contains( p->page ) )
400  visibleRect = visibleRects[ p->page ]->rect;
401 
402  // Free non visible tiles
403  tilesManager->cleanupPixmapMemory( memoryToFree, visibleRect, currentViewportPage );
404 
405  p->memory = tilesManager->totalMemory();
406  memoryDiff -= p->memory;
407  memoryToFree = (memoryDiff < memoryToFree) ? (memoryToFree - memoryDiff) : 0;
408  m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory -= memoryDiff;
409 
410  if ( p->memory > 0 )
411  pixmapsToKeep.append( p );
412  else
413  delete p;
414  }
415  else
416  pixmapsToKeep.append( p );
417  }
418 
419  if (clean_hits == 0) break;
420  }
421 
422  m_allocatedPixmaps += pixmapsToKeep;
423  //p--rintf("freeMemory A:[%d -%d = %d] \n", m_allocatedPixmaps.count() + pagesFreed, pagesFreed, m_allocatedPixmaps.count() );
424 }
425 
426 /* Returns the next pixmap to evict from cache, or NULL if no suitable pixmap
427  * if found. If unloadableOnly is set, only unloadable pixmaps are returned. If
428  * thenRemoveIt is set, the pixmap is removed from m_allocatedPixmaps before
429  * returning it
430  */
431 AllocatedPixmap * DocumentPrivate::searchLowestPriorityPixmap( bool unloadableOnly, bool thenRemoveIt, DocumentObserver *observer )
432 {
433  QLinkedList< AllocatedPixmap * >::iterator pIt = m_allocatedPixmaps.begin();
434  QLinkedList< AllocatedPixmap * >::iterator pEnd = m_allocatedPixmaps.end();
435  QLinkedList< AllocatedPixmap * >::iterator farthestPixmap = pEnd;
436  const int currentViewportPage = (*m_viewportIterator).pageNumber;
437 
438  /* Find the pixmap that is farthest from the current viewport */
439  int maxDistance = -1;
440  while ( pIt != pEnd )
441  {
442  const AllocatedPixmap * p = *pIt;
443  // Filter by observer
444  if ( observer == 0 || p->observer == observer )
445  {
446  const int distance = qAbs( p->page - currentViewportPage );
447  if ( maxDistance < distance && ( !unloadableOnly || p->observer->canUnloadPixmap( p->page ) ) )
448  {
449  maxDistance = distance;
450  farthestPixmap = pIt;
451  }
452  }
453  ++pIt;
454  }
455 
456  /* No pixmap to remove */
457  if ( farthestPixmap == pEnd )
458  return 0;
459 
460  AllocatedPixmap * selectedPixmap = *farthestPixmap;
461  if ( thenRemoveIt )
462  m_allocatedPixmaps.erase( farthestPixmap );
463  return selectedPixmap;
464 }
465 
466 qulonglong DocumentPrivate::getTotalMemory()
467 {
468  static qulonglong cachedValue = 0;
469  if ( cachedValue )
470  return cachedValue;
471 
472 #if defined(Q_OS_LINUX)
473  // if /proc/meminfo doesn't exist, return 128MB
474  QFile memFile( "/proc/meminfo" );
475  if ( !memFile.open( QIODevice::ReadOnly ) )
476  return (cachedValue = 134217728);
477 
478  QTextStream readStream( &memFile );
479  while ( true )
480  {
481  QString entry = readStream.readLine();
482  if ( entry.isNull() ) break;
483  if ( entry.startsWith( "MemTotal:" ) )
484  return (cachedValue = (Q_UINT64_C(1024) * entry.section( ' ', -2, -2 ).toULongLong()));
485  }
486 #elif defined(Q_OS_FREEBSD)
487  qulonglong physmem;
488  int mib[] = {CTL_HW, HW_PHYSMEM};
489  size_t len = sizeof( physmem );
490  if ( sysctl( mib, 2, &physmem, &len, NULL, 0 ) == 0 )
491  return (cachedValue = physmem);
492 #elif defined(Q_OS_WIN)
493  MEMORYSTATUSEX stat;
494  stat.dwLength = sizeof(stat);
495  GlobalMemoryStatusEx (&stat);
496 
497  return ( cachedValue = stat.ullTotalPhys );
498 #endif
499  return (cachedValue = 134217728);
500 }
501 
502 qulonglong DocumentPrivate::getFreeMemory( qulonglong *freeSwap )
503 {
504  static QTime lastUpdate = QTime::currentTime().addSecs(-3);
505  static qulonglong cachedValue = 0;
506  static qulonglong cachedFreeSwap = 0;
507 
508  if ( qAbs( lastUpdate.secsTo( QTime::currentTime() ) ) <= 2 )
509  {
510  if (freeSwap)
511  *freeSwap = cachedFreeSwap;
512  return cachedValue;
513  }
514 
515  /* Initialize the returned free swap value to 0. It is overwritten if the
516  * actual value is available */
517  if (freeSwap)
518  *freeSwap = 0;
519 
520 #if defined(Q_OS_LINUX)
521  // if /proc/meminfo doesn't exist, return MEMORY FULL
522  QFile memFile( "/proc/meminfo" );
523  if ( !memFile.open( QIODevice::ReadOnly ) )
524  return 0;
525 
526  // read /proc/meminfo and sum up the contents of 'MemFree', 'Buffers'
527  // and 'Cached' fields. consider swapped memory as used memory.
528  qulonglong memoryFree = 0;
529  QString entry;
530  QTextStream readStream( &memFile );
531  static const int nElems = 5;
532  QString names[nElems] = { "MemFree:", "Buffers:", "Cached:", "SwapFree:", "SwapTotal:" };
533  qulonglong values[nElems] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
534  bool foundValues[nElems] = { false, false, false, false, false };
535  while ( true )
536  {
537  entry = readStream.readLine();
538  if ( entry.isNull() ) break;
539  for ( int i = 0; i < nElems; ++i )
540  {
541  if ( entry.startsWith( names[i] ) )
542  {
543  values[i] = entry.section( ' ', -2, -2 ).toULongLong( &foundValues[i] );
544  }
545  }
546  }
547  memFile.close();
548  bool found = true;
549  for ( int i = 0; found && i < nElems; ++i )
550  found = found && foundValues[i];
551  if ( found )
552  {
553  /* MemFree + Buffers + Cached - SwapUsed =
554  * = MemFree + Buffers + Cached - (SwapTotal - SwapFree) =
555  * = MemFree + Buffers + Cached + SwapFree - SwapTotal */
556  memoryFree = values[0] + values[1] + values[2] + values[3];
557  if ( values[4] > memoryFree )
558  memoryFree = 0;
559  else
560  memoryFree -= values[4];
561  }
562  else
563  {
564  return 0;
565  }
566 
567  lastUpdate = QTime::currentTime();
568 
569  if (freeSwap)
570  *freeSwap = ( cachedFreeSwap = (Q_UINT64_C(1024) * values[3]) );
571  return ( cachedValue = (Q_UINT64_C(1024) * memoryFree) );
572 #elif defined(Q_OS_FREEBSD)
573  qulonglong cache, inact, free, psize;
574  size_t cachelen, inactlen, freelen, psizelen;
575  cachelen = sizeof( cache );
576  inactlen = sizeof( inact );
577  freelen = sizeof( free );
578  psizelen = sizeof( psize );
579  // sum up inactive, cached and free memory
580  if ( sysctlbyname( "vm.stats.vm.v_cache_count", &cache, &cachelen, NULL, 0 ) == 0 &&
581  sysctlbyname( "vm.stats.vm.v_inactive_count", &inact, &inactlen, NULL, 0 ) == 0 &&
582  sysctlbyname( "vm.stats.vm.v_free_count", &free, &freelen, NULL, 0 ) == 0 &&
583  sysctlbyname( "vm.stats.vm.v_page_size", &psize, &psizelen, NULL, 0 ) == 0 )
584  {
585  lastUpdate = QTime::currentTime();
586  return (cachedValue = (cache + inact + free) * psize);
587  }
588  else
589  {
590  return 0;
591  }
592 #elif defined(Q_OS_WIN)
593  MEMORYSTATUSEX stat;
594  stat.dwLength = sizeof(stat);
595  GlobalMemoryStatusEx (&stat);
596 
597  lastUpdate = QTime::currentTime();
598 
599  if (freeSwap)
600  *freeSwap = ( cachedFreeSwap = stat.ullAvailPageFile );
601  return ( cachedValue = stat.ullAvailPhys );
602 #else
603  // tell the memory is full.. will act as in LOW profile
604  return 0;
605 #endif
606 }
607 
608 void DocumentPrivate::loadDocumentInfo()
609 // note: load data and stores it internally (document or pages). observers
610 // are still uninitialized at this point so don't access them
611 {
612  //kDebug(OkularDebug).nospace() << "Using '" << d->m_xmlFileName << "' as document info file.";
613  if ( m_xmlFileName.isEmpty() )
614  return;
615 
616  loadDocumentInfo( m_xmlFileName );
617 }
618 
619 void DocumentPrivate::loadDocumentInfo( const QString &fileName )
620 {
621  QFile infoFile( fileName );
622  if ( !infoFile.exists() || !infoFile.open( QIODevice::ReadOnly ) )
623  return;
624 
625  // Load DOM from XML file
626  QDomDocument doc( "documentInfo" );
627  if ( !doc.setContent( &infoFile ) )
628  {
629  kDebug(OkularDebug) << "Can't load XML pair! Check for broken xml.";
630  infoFile.close();
631  return;
632  }
633  infoFile.close();
634 
635  QDomElement root = doc.documentElement();
636  if ( root.tagName() != "documentInfo" )
637  return;
638 
639  KUrl documentUrl( root.attribute( "url" ) );
640 
641  // Parse the DOM tree
642  QDomNode topLevelNode = root.firstChild();
643  while ( topLevelNode.isElement() )
644  {
645  QString catName = topLevelNode.toElement().tagName();
646 
647  // Restore page attributes (bookmark, annotations, ...) from the DOM
648  if ( catName == "pageList" )
649  {
650  QDomNode pageNode = topLevelNode.firstChild();
651  while ( pageNode.isElement() )
652  {
653  QDomElement pageElement = pageNode.toElement();
654  if ( pageElement.hasAttribute( "number" ) )
655  {
656  // get page number (node's attribute)
657  bool ok;
658  int pageNumber = pageElement.attribute( "number" ).toInt( &ok );
659 
660  // pass the domElement to the right page, to read config data from
661  if ( ok && pageNumber >= 0 && pageNumber < (int)m_pagesVector.count() )
662  m_pagesVector[ pageNumber ]->d->restoreLocalContents( pageElement );
663  }
664  pageNode = pageNode.nextSibling();
665  }
666  }
667 
668  // Restore 'general info' from the DOM
669  else if ( catName == "generalInfo" )
670  {
671  QDomNode infoNode = topLevelNode.firstChild();
672  while ( infoNode.isElement() )
673  {
674  QDomElement infoElement = infoNode.toElement();
675 
676  // restore viewports history
677  if ( infoElement.tagName() == "history" )
678  {
679  // clear history
680  m_viewportHistory.clear();
681  // append old viewports
682  QDomNode historyNode = infoNode.firstChild();
683  while ( historyNode.isElement() )
684  {
685  QDomElement historyElement = historyNode.toElement();
686  if ( historyElement.hasAttribute( "viewport" ) )
687  {
688  QString vpString = historyElement.attribute( "viewport" );
689  m_viewportIterator = m_viewportHistory.insert( m_viewportHistory.end(),
690  DocumentViewport( vpString ) );
691  }
692  historyNode = historyNode.nextSibling();
693  }
694  // consistancy check
695  if ( m_viewportHistory.isEmpty() )
696  m_viewportIterator = m_viewportHistory.insert( m_viewportHistory.end(), DocumentViewport() );
697  }
698  else if ( infoElement.tagName() == "rotation" )
699  {
700  QString str = infoElement.text();
701  bool ok = true;
702  int newrotation = !str.isEmpty() ? ( str.toInt( &ok ) % 4 ) : 0;
703  if ( ok && newrotation != 0 )
704  {
705  setRotationInternal( newrotation, false );
706  }
707  }
708  else if ( infoElement.tagName() == "views" )
709  {
710  QDomNode viewNode = infoNode.firstChild();
711  while ( viewNode.isElement() )
712  {
713  QDomElement viewElement = viewNode.toElement();
714  if ( viewElement.tagName() == "view" )
715  {
716  const QString viewName = viewElement.attribute( "name" );
717  Q_FOREACH ( View * view, m_views )
718  {
719  if ( view->name() == viewName )
720  {
721  loadViewsInfo( view, viewElement );
722  break;
723  }
724  }
725  }
726  viewNode = viewNode.nextSibling();
727  }
728  }
729  infoNode = infoNode.nextSibling();
730  }
731  }
732 
733  topLevelNode = topLevelNode.nextSibling();
734  } // </documentInfo>
735 }
736 
737 void DocumentPrivate::loadViewsInfo( View *view, const QDomElement &e )
738 {
739  QDomNode viewNode = e.firstChild();
740  while ( viewNode.isElement() )
741  {
742  QDomElement viewElement = viewNode.toElement();
743 
744  if ( viewElement.tagName() == "zoom" )
745  {
746  const QString valueString = viewElement.attribute( "value" );
747  bool newzoom_ok = true;
748  const double newzoom = !valueString.isEmpty() ? valueString.toDouble( &newzoom_ok ) : 1.0;
749  if ( newzoom_ok && newzoom != 0
750  && view->supportsCapability( View::Zoom )
751  && ( view->capabilityFlags( View::Zoom ) & ( View::CapabilityRead | View::CapabilitySerializable ) ) )
752  {
753  view->setCapability( View::Zoom, newzoom );
754  }
755  const QString modeString = viewElement.attribute( "mode" );
756  bool newmode_ok = true;
757  const int newmode = !modeString.isEmpty() ? modeString.toInt( &newmode_ok ) : 2;
758  if ( newmode_ok
759  && view->supportsCapability( View::ZoomModality )
760  && ( view->capabilityFlags( View::ZoomModality ) & ( View::CapabilityRead | View::CapabilitySerializable ) ) )
761  {
762  view->setCapability( View::ZoomModality, newmode );
763  }
764  }
765 
766  viewNode = viewNode.nextSibling();
767  }
768 }
769 
770 void DocumentPrivate::saveViewsInfo( View *view, QDomElement &e ) const
771 {
772  if ( view->supportsCapability( View::Zoom )
773  && ( view->capabilityFlags( View::Zoom ) & ( View::CapabilityRead | View::CapabilitySerializable ) )
774  && view->supportsCapability( View::ZoomModality )
775  && ( view->capabilityFlags( View::ZoomModality ) & ( View::CapabilityRead | View::CapabilitySerializable ) ) )
776  {
777  QDomElement zoomEl = e.ownerDocument().createElement( "zoom" );
778  e.appendChild( zoomEl );
779  bool ok = true;
780  const double zoom = view->capability( View::Zoom ).toDouble( &ok );
781  if ( ok && zoom != 0 )
782  {
783  zoomEl.setAttribute( "value", QString::number(zoom) );
784  }
785  const int mode = view->capability( View::ZoomModality ).toInt( &ok );
786  if ( ok )
787  {
788  zoomEl.setAttribute( "mode", mode );
789  }
790  }
791 }

816 Generator * DocumentPrivate::loadGeneratorLibrary( const KService::Ptr &service )
817 {
818  KPluginFactory *factory = KPluginLoader( service->library() ).factory();
819  if ( !factory )
820  {
821  kWarning(OkularDebug).nospace() << "Invalid plugin factory for " << service->library() << "!";
822  return 0;
823  }
824  Generator * generator = factory->create< Okular::Generator >( service->pluginKeyword(), 0 );
825  GeneratorInfo info( factory->componentData() );
826  info.generator = generator;
827  if ( info.data.isValid() && info.data.aboutData() )
828  info.catalogName = info.data.aboutData()->catalogName();
829  m_loadedGenerators.insert( service->name(), info );
830  return generator;
831 }

845 void DocumentPrivate::loadServiceList( const KService::List& offers )
846 {
847  int count = offers.count();
848  if ( count <= 0 )
849  return;
850 
851  for ( int i = 0; i < count; ++i )
852  {
853  QString propName = offers.at(i)->name();
854  // don't load already loaded generators
855  QHash< QString, GeneratorInfo >::const_iterator genIt = m_loadedGenerators.constFind( propName );
856  if ( !m_loadedGenerators.isEmpty() && genIt != m_loadedGenerators.constEnd() )
857  continue;
858 
859  Generator * g = loadGeneratorLibrary( offers.at(i) );
860  (void)g;
861  }
862 }

906 bool DocumentPrivate::openDocumentInternal( const KService::Ptr& offer, bool isstdin, const QString& docFile, const QByteArray& filedata )
907 {
908  QString propName = offer->name();
909  QHash< QString, GeneratorInfo >::const_iterator genIt = m_loadedGenerators.constFind( propName );
910  QString catalogName;
911  if ( genIt != m_loadedGenerators.constEnd() )
912  {
913  m_generator = genIt.value().generator;
914  catalogName = genIt.value().catalogName;
915  }
916  else
917  {
918  m_generator = loadGeneratorLibrary( offer );
919  if ( !m_generator )
920  return false;
921  genIt = m_loadedGenerators.constFind( propName );
922  Q_ASSERT( genIt != m_loadedGenerators.constEnd() );
923  catalogName = genIt.value().catalogName;
924  }
925  Q_ASSERT_X( m_generator, "Document::load()", "null generator?!" );
926 
927  if ( !catalogName.isEmpty() )
928  KGlobal::locale()->insertCatalog( catalogName );
929 
930  m_generator->d_func()->m_document = this;
931 
932  // connect error reporting signals
933  QObject::connect( m_generator, SIGNAL(error(QString,int)), m_parent, SIGNAL(error(QString,int)) );
934  QObject::connect( m_generator, SIGNAL(warning(QString,int)), m_parent, SIGNAL(warning(QString,int)) );
935  QObject::connect( m_generator, SIGNAL(notice(QString,int)), m_parent, SIGNAL(notice(QString,int)) );
936 
937  QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
938 
939  m_generator->setDPI(Utils::realDpi(m_widget));
940 
941  bool openOk = false;
942  if ( !isstdin )
943  {
944  openOk = m_generator->loadDocument( docFile, m_pagesVector );
945  }
946  else if ( !filedata.isEmpty() )
947  {
948  if ( m_generator->hasFeature( Generator::ReadRawData ) )
949  {
950  openOk = m_generator->loadDocumentFromData( filedata, m_pagesVector );
951  }
952  else
953  {
954  m_tempFile = new KTemporaryFile();
955  if ( !m_tempFile->open() )
956  {
957  delete m_tempFile;
958  m_tempFile = 0;
959  }
960  else
961  {
962  m_tempFile->write( filedata );
963  QString tmpFileName = m_tempFile->fileName();
964  m_tempFile->close();
965  openOk = m_generator->loadDocument( tmpFileName, m_pagesVector );
966  }
967  }
968  }
969 
970  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
971  if ( !openOk || m_pagesVector.size() <= 0 )
972  {
973  if ( !catalogName.isEmpty() )
974  KGlobal::locale()->removeCatalog( catalogName );
975 
976  m_generator->d_func()->m_document = 0;
977  QObject::disconnect( m_generator, 0, m_parent, 0 );
978  m_generator = 0;
979 
980  qDeleteAll( m_pagesVector );
981  m_pagesVector.clear();
982  delete m_tempFile;
983  m_tempFile = 0;
984 
985  // TODO: emit a message telling the document is empty
986 
987  openOk = false;
988  }
989 
990  return openOk;
991 }
992 
993 bool DocumentPrivate::savePageDocumentInfo( KTemporaryFile *infoFile, int what ) const
994 {
995  if ( infoFile->open() )
996  {
997  // 1. Create DOM
998  QDomDocument doc( "documentInfo" );
999  QDomProcessingInstruction xmlPi = doc.createProcessingInstruction(
1000  QString::fromLatin1( "xml" ), QString::fromLatin1( "version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"" ) );
1001  doc.appendChild( xmlPi );
1002  QDomElement root = doc.createElement( "documentInfo" );
1003  doc.appendChild( root );
1004 
1005  // 2.1. Save page attributes (bookmark state, annotations, ... ) to DOM
1006  QDomElement pageList = doc.createElement( "pageList" );
1007  root.appendChild( pageList );
1008  // <page list><page number='x'>.... </page> save pages that hold data
1009  QVector< Page * >::const_iterator pIt = m_pagesVector.constBegin(), pEnd = m_pagesVector.constEnd();
1010  for ( ; pIt != pEnd; ++pIt )
1011  (*pIt)->d->saveLocalContents( pageList, doc, PageItems( what ) );
1012 
1013  // 3. Save DOM to XML file
1014  QString xml = doc.toString();
1015  QTextStream os( infoFile );
1016  os.setCodec( "UTF-8" );
1017  os << xml;
1018  return true;
1019  }
1020  return false;
1021 }

1037 void DocumentPrivate::warnLimitedAnnotSupport()
1038 {
1039  if ( !m_showWarningLimitedAnnotSupport )
1040  return;
1041  m_showWarningLimitedAnnotSupport = false; // Show the warning once
1042 
1043  if ( m_annotationsNeedSaveAs )
1044  {
1045  // Shown if the user is editing annotations in a file whose metadata is
1046  // not stored locally (.okular archives belong to this category)
1047  KMessageBox::information( m_parent->widget(), i18n("Your annotation changes will not be saved automatically. Use File -> Save As...\nor your changes will be lost once the document is closed"), QString(), "annotNeedSaveAs" );
1048  }
1049  else if ( !canAddAnnotationsNatively() )
1050  {
1051  // If the generator doesn't support native annotations
1052  KMessageBox::information( m_parent->widget(), i18n("Your annotations are saved internally by Okular.\nYou can export the annotated document using File -> Export As -> Document Archive"), QString(), "annotExportAsArchive" );
1053  }
1054 }
1055 
1056 void DocumentPrivate::performAddPageAnnotation( int page, Annotation * annotation )
1057 {
1058  Okular::SaveInterface * iface = qobject_cast< Okular::SaveInterface * >( m_generator );
1059  AnnotationProxy *proxy = iface ? iface->annotationProxy() : 0;
1060 
1061  // find out the page to attach annotation
1062  Page * kp = m_pagesVector[ page ];
1063  if ( !m_generator || !kp )
1064  return;
1065 
1066  // the annotation belongs already to a page
1067  if ( annotation->d_ptr->m_page )
1068  return;
1069 
1070  // add annotation to the page
1071  kp->addAnnotation( annotation );
1072 
1073  // tell the annotation proxy
1074  if ( proxy && proxy->supports(AnnotationProxy::Addition) )
1075  proxy->notifyAddition( annotation, page );
1076 
1077  // notify observers about the change
1078  notifyAnnotationChanges( page );
1079 
1080  if ( annotation->flags() & Annotation::ExternallyDrawn )
1081  {
1082  // Redraw everything, including ExternallyDrawn annotations
1083  refreshPixmaps( page );
1084  }
1085 
1086  warnLimitedAnnotSupport();
1087 }
1088 
1089 void DocumentPrivate::performRemovePageAnnotation( int page, Annotation * annotation )
1090 {
1091  Okular::SaveInterface * iface = qobject_cast< Okular::SaveInterface * >( m_generator );
1092  AnnotationProxy *proxy = iface ? iface->annotationProxy() : 0;
1093  bool isExternallyDrawn;
1094 
1095  // find out the page
1096  Page * kp = m_pagesVector[ page ];
1097  if ( !m_generator || !kp )
1098  return;
1099 
1100  if ( annotation->flags() & Annotation::ExternallyDrawn )
1101  isExternallyDrawn = true;
1102  else
1103  isExternallyDrawn = false;
1104 
1105  // try to remove the annotation
1106  if ( m_parent->canRemovePageAnnotation( annotation ) )
1107  {
1108  // tell the annotation proxy
1109  if ( proxy && proxy->supports(AnnotationProxy::Removal) )
1110  proxy->notifyRemoval( annotation, page );
1111 
1112  kp->removeAnnotation( annotation ); // Also destroys the object
1113 
1114  // in case of success, notify observers about the change
1115  notifyAnnotationChanges( page );
1116 
1117  if ( isExternallyDrawn )
1118  {
1119  // Redraw everything, including ExternallyDrawn annotations
1120  refreshPixmaps( page );
1121  }
1122  }
1123 
1124  warnLimitedAnnotSupport();
1125 }
1126 
1127 void DocumentPrivate::performModifyPageAnnotation( int page, Annotation * annotation, bool appearanceChanged )
1128 {
1129  Okular::SaveInterface * iface = qobject_cast< Okular::SaveInterface * >( m_generator );
1130  AnnotationProxy *proxy = iface ? iface->annotationProxy() : 0;
1131 
1132  // find out the page
1133  Page * kp = m_pagesVector[ page ];
1134  if ( !m_generator || !kp )
1135  return;
1136 
1137  // tell the annotation proxy
1138  if ( proxy && proxy->supports(AnnotationProxy::Modification) )
1139  {
1140  proxy->notifyModification( annotation, page, appearanceChanged );
1141  }
1142 
1143  // notify observers about the change
1144  notifyAnnotationChanges( page );
1145  if ( appearanceChanged && (annotation->flags() & Annotation::ExternallyDrawn) )
1146  {
1147  /* When an annotation is being moved, the generator will not render it.
1148  * Therefore there's no need to refresh pixmaps after the first time */
1149  if ( annotation->flags() & Annotation::BeingMoved )
1150  {
1151  if ( m_annotationBeingMoved )
1152  return;
1153  else // First time: take note
1154  m_annotationBeingMoved = true;
1155  }
1156  else
1157  {
1158  m_annotationBeingMoved = false;
1159  }
1160 
1161  // Redraw everything, including ExternallyDrawn annotations
1162  kDebug(OkularDebug) << "Refreshing Pixmaps";
1163  refreshPixmaps( page );
1164  }
1165 
1166  // If the user is moving the annotation, don't steal the focus
1167  if ( (annotation->flags() & Annotation::BeingMoved) == 0 )
1168  warnLimitedAnnotSupport();
1169 }
1170 
1171 void DocumentPrivate::performSetAnnotationContents( const QString & newContents, Annotation *annot, int pageNumber )
1172 {
1173  bool appearanceChanged = false;
1174 
1175  // Check if appearanceChanged should be true
1176  switch ( annot->subType() )
1177  {
1178  // If it's an in-place TextAnnotation, set the inplace text
1179  case Okular::Annotation::AText:
1180  {
1181  Okular::TextAnnotation * txtann = static_cast< Okular::TextAnnotation * >( annot );
1182  if ( txtann->textType() == Okular::TextAnnotation::InPlace )
1183  {
1184  appearanceChanged = true;
1185  }
1186  break;
1187  }
1188  // If it's a LineAnnotation, check if caption text is visible
1189  case Okular::Annotation::ALine:
1190  {
1191  Okular::LineAnnotation * lineann = static_cast< Okular::LineAnnotation * >( annot );
1192  if ( lineann->showCaption() )
1193  appearanceChanged = true;
1194  break;
1195  }
1196  default:
1197  break;
1198  }
1199 
1200  // Set contents
1201  annot->setContents( newContents );
1202 
1203  // Tell the document the annotation has been modified
1204  performModifyPageAnnotation( pageNumber, annot, appearanceChanged );
1205 }
1206 
1207 void DocumentPrivate::saveDocumentInfo() const
1208 {
1209  if ( m_xmlFileName.isEmpty() )
1210  return;
1211 
1212  QFile infoFile( m_xmlFileName );
1213  if (infoFile.open( QIODevice::WriteOnly | QIODevice::Truncate) )
1214  {
1215  // 1. Create DOM
1216  QDomDocument doc( "documentInfo" );
1217  QDomProcessingInstruction xmlPi = doc.createProcessingInstruction(
1218  QString::fromLatin1( "xml" ), QString::fromLatin1( "version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"" ) );
1219  doc.appendChild( xmlPi );
1220  QDomElement root = doc.createElement( "documentInfo" );
1221  root.setAttribute( "url", m_url.pathOrUrl() );
1222  doc.appendChild( root );
1223 
1224  // 2.1. Save page attributes (bookmark state, annotations, ... ) to DOM
1225  QDomElement pageList = doc.createElement( "pageList" );
1226  root.appendChild( pageList );
1227  PageItems saveWhat = AllPageItems;
1228  if ( m_annotationsNeedSaveAs )
1229  {
1230  /* In this case, if the user makes a modification, he's requested to
1231  * save to a new document. Therefore, if there are existing local
1232  * annotations, we save them back unmodified in the original
1233  * document's metadata, so that it appears that it was not changed */
1234  saveWhat |= OriginalAnnotationPageItems;
1235  }
1236  // <page list><page number='x'>.... </page> save pages that hold data
1237  QVector< Page * >::const_iterator pIt = m_pagesVector.constBegin(), pEnd = m_pagesVector.constEnd();
1238  for ( ; pIt != pEnd; ++pIt )
1239  (*pIt)->d->saveLocalContents( pageList, doc, saveWhat );
1240 
1241  // 2.2. Save document info (current viewport, history, ... ) to DOM
1242  QDomElement generalInfo = doc.createElement( "generalInfo" );
1243  root.appendChild( generalInfo );
1244  // create rotation node
1245  if ( m_rotation != Rotation0 )
1246  {
1247  QDomElement rotationNode = doc.createElement( "rotation" );
1248  generalInfo.appendChild( rotationNode );
1249  rotationNode.appendChild( doc.createTextNode( QString::number( (int)m_rotation ) ) );
1250  }
1251  // <general info><history> ... </history> save history up to OKULAR_HISTORY_SAVEDSTEPS viewports
1252  QLinkedList< DocumentViewport >::const_iterator backIterator = m_viewportIterator;
1253  if ( backIterator != m_viewportHistory.constEnd() )
1254  {
1255  // go back up to OKULAR_HISTORY_SAVEDSTEPS steps from the current viewportIterator
1256  int backSteps = OKULAR_HISTORY_SAVEDSTEPS;
1257  while ( backSteps-- && backIterator != m_viewportHistory.constBegin() )
1258  --backIterator;
1259 
1260  // create history root node
1261  QDomElement historyNode = doc.createElement( "history" );
1262  generalInfo.appendChild( historyNode );
1263 
1264  // add old[backIterator] and present[viewportIterator] items
1265  QLinkedList< DocumentViewport >::const_iterator endIt = m_viewportIterator;
1266  ++endIt;
1267  while ( backIterator != endIt )
1268  {
1269  QString name = (backIterator == m_viewportIterator) ? "current" : "oldPage";
1270  QDomElement historyEntry = doc.createElement( name );
1271  historyEntry.setAttribute( "viewport", (*backIterator).toString() );
1272  historyNode.appendChild( historyEntry );
1273  ++backIterator;
1274  }
1275  }
1276  // create views root node
1277  QDomElement viewsNode = doc.createElement( "views" );
1278  generalInfo.appendChild( viewsNode );
1279  Q_FOREACH ( View * view, m_views )
1280  {
1281  QDomElement viewEntry = doc.createElement( "view" );
1282  viewEntry.setAttribute( "name", view->name() );
1283  viewsNode.appendChild( viewEntry );
1284  saveViewsInfo( view, viewEntry );
1285  }
1286 
1287  // 3. Save DOM to XML file
1288  QString xml = doc.toString();
1289  QTextStream os( &infoFile );
1290  os.setCodec( "UTF-8" );
1291  os << xml;
1292  }
1293  infoFile.close();
1294 }

1296 void DocumentPrivate::slotTimedMemoryCheck()
1297 {
1298  // [MEM] clean memory (for 'free mem dependant' profiles only)
1299  if ( SettingsCore::memoryLevel() != SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Low &&
1300  m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory > 1024*1024 )
1301  cleanupPixmapMemory();
1302 }
1303 
1304 void DocumentPrivate::sendGeneratorPixmapRequest()
1305 {
1306  /* If the pixmap cache will have to be cleaned in order to make room for the
1307  * next request, get the distance from the current viewport of the page
1308  * whose pixmap will be removed. We will ignore preload requests for pages
1309  * that are at the same distance or farther */
1310  const qulonglong memoryToFree = calculateMemoryToFree();
1311  const int currentViewportPage = (*m_viewportIterator).pageNumber;
1312  int maxDistance = INT_MAX; // Default: No maximum
1313  if ( memoryToFree )
1314  {
1315  AllocatedPixmap *pixmapToReplace = searchLowestPriorityPixmap( true );
1316  if ( pixmapToReplace )
1317  maxDistance = qAbs( pixmapToReplace->page - currentViewportPage );
1318  }
1319 
1320  // find a request
1321  PixmapRequest * request = 0;
1322  m_pixmapRequestsMutex.lock();
1323  while ( !m_pixmapRequestsStack.isEmpty() && !request )
1324  {
1325  PixmapRequest * r = m_pixmapRequestsStack.last();
1326  if (!r)
1327  {
1328  m_pixmapRequestsStack.pop_back();
1329  continue;
1330  }
1331 
1332  QRect requestRect = r->isTile() ? r->normalizedRect().geometry( r->width(), r->height() ) : QRect( 0, 0, r->width(), r->height() );
1333  TilesManager *tilesManager = r->d->tilesManager();
1334 
1335  // If it's a preload but the generator is not threaded no point in trying to preload
1336  if ( r->preload() && !m_generator->hasFeature( Generator::Threaded ) )
1337  {
1338  m_pixmapRequestsStack.pop_back();
1339  delete r;
1340  }
1341  // request only if page isn't already present and request has valid id
1342  // request only if page isn't already present and request has valid id
1343  else if ( ( !r->d->mForce && r->page()->hasPixmap( r->observer(), r->width(), r->height(), r->normalizedRect() ) ) || !m_observers.contains(r->observer()) )
1344  {
1345  m_pixmapRequestsStack.pop_back();
1346  delete r;
1347  }
1348  else if ( !r->d->mForce && r->preload() && qAbs( r->pageNumber() - currentViewportPage ) >= maxDistance )
1349  {
1350  m_pixmapRequestsStack.pop_back();
1351  //kDebug() << "Ignoring request that doesn't fit in cache";
1352  delete r;
1353  }
1354  // Ignore requests for pixmaps that are already being generated
1355  else if ( tilesManager && tilesManager->isRequesting( r->normalizedRect(), r->width(), r->height() ) )
1356  {
1357  m_pixmapRequestsStack.pop_back();
1358  delete r;
1359  }
1360  // If the requested area is above 8000000 pixels, switch on the tile manager
1361  else if ( !tilesManager && m_generator->hasFeature( Generator::TiledRendering ) && (long)r->width() * (long)r->height() > 8000000L )
1362  {
1363  // if the image is too big. start using tiles
1364  kDebug(OkularDebug).nospace() << "Start using tiles on page " << r->pageNumber()
1365  << " (" << r->width() << "x" << r->height() << " px);";
1366 
1367  // fill the tiles manager with the last rendered pixmap
1368  const QPixmap *pixmap = r->page()->_o_nearestPixmap( r->observer(), r->width(), r->height() );
1369  if ( pixmap )
1370  {
1371  tilesManager = new TilesManager( r->pageNumber(), pixmap->width(), pixmap->height(), r->page()->rotation() );
1372  tilesManager->setPixmap( pixmap, NormalizedRect( 0, 0, 1, 1 ) );
1373  tilesManager->setSize( r->width(), r->height() );
1374  }
1375  else
1376  {
1377  // create new tiles manager
1378  tilesManager = new TilesManager( r->pageNumber(), r->width(), r->height(), r->page()->rotation() );
1379  }
1380  tilesManager->setRequest( r->normalizedRect(), r->width(), r->height() );
1381  r->page()->deletePixmap( r->observer() );
1382  r->page()->d->setTilesManager( r->observer(), tilesManager );
1383  r->setTile( true );
1384 
1385  // Change normalizedRect to the smallest rect that contains all
1386  // visible tiles.
1387  if ( !r->normalizedRect().isNull() )
1388  {
1389  NormalizedRect tilesRect;
1390  const QList<Tile> tiles = tilesManager->tilesAt( r->normalizedRect(), TilesManager::TerminalTile );
1391  QList<Tile>::const_iterator tIt = tiles.constBegin(), tEnd = tiles.constEnd();
1392  while ( tIt != tEnd )
1393  {
1394  Tile tile = *tIt;
1395  if ( tilesRect.isNull() )
1396  tilesRect = tile.rect();
1397  else
1398  tilesRect |= tile.rect();
1399 
1400  ++tIt;
1401  }
1402 
1403  r->setNormalizedRect( tilesRect );
1404  request = r;
1405  }
1406  else
1407  {
1408  // Discard request if normalizedRect is null. This happens in
1409  // preload requests issued by PageView if the requested page is
1410  // not visible and the user has just switched from a non-tiled
1411  // zoom level to a tiled one
1412  m_pixmapRequestsStack.pop_back();
1413  delete r;
1414  }
1415  }
1416  // If the requested area is below 6000000 pixels, switch off the tile manager
1417  else if ( tilesManager && (long)r->width() * (long)r->height() < 6000000L )
1418  {
1419  kDebug(OkularDebug).nospace() << "Stop using tiles on page " << r->pageNumber()
1420  << " (" << r->width() << "x" << r->height() << " px);";
1421 
1422  // page is too small. stop using tiles.
1423  r->page()->deletePixmap( r->observer() );
1424  r->setTile( false );
1425 
1426  request = r;
1427  }
1428  else if ( (long)requestRect.width() * (long)requestRect.height() > 20000000L )
1429  {
1430  m_pixmapRequestsStack.pop_back();
1431  if ( !m_warnedOutOfMemory )
1432  {
1433  kWarning(OkularDebug).nospace() << "Running out of memory on page " << r->pageNumber()
1434  << " (" << r->width() << "x" << r->height() << " px);";
1435  kWarning(OkularDebug) << "this message will be reported only once.";
1436  m_warnedOutOfMemory = true;
1437  }
1438  delete r;
1439  }
1440  else
1441  {
1442  request = r;
1443  }
1444  }
1445 
1446  // if no request found (or already generated), return
1447  if ( !request )
1448  {
1449  m_pixmapRequestsMutex.unlock();
1450  return;
1451  }
1452 
1453  // [MEM] preventive memory freeing
1454  qulonglong pixmapBytes = 0;
1455  TilesManager * tm = request->d->tilesManager();
1456  if ( tm )
1457  pixmapBytes = tm->totalMemory();
1458  else
1459  pixmapBytes = 4 * request->width() * request->height();
1460 
1461  if ( pixmapBytes > (1024 * 1024) )
1462  cleanupPixmapMemory( memoryToFree /* previously calculated value */ );
1463 
1464  // submit the request to the generator
1465  if ( m_generator->canGeneratePixmap() )
1466  {
1467  QRect requestRect = !request->isTile() ? QRect(0, 0, request->width(), request->height() ) : request->normalizedRect().geometry( request->width(), request->height() );
1468  kDebug(OkularDebug).nospace() << "sending request observer=" << request->observer() << " " <<requestRect.width() << "x" << requestRect.height() << "@" << request->pageNumber() << " async == " << request->asynchronous() << " isTile == " << request->isTile();
1469  m_pixmapRequestsStack.removeAll ( request );
1470 
1471  if ( tm )
1472  tm->setRequest( request->normalizedRect(), request->width(), request->height() );
1473 
1474  if ( (int)m_rotation % 2 )
1475  request->d->swap();
1476 
1477  if ( m_rotation != Rotation0 && !request->normalizedRect().isNull() )
1478  request->setNormalizedRect( TilesManager::fromRotatedRect(
1479  request->normalizedRect(), m_rotation ) );
1480 
1481  // we always have to unlock _before_ the generatePixmap() because
1482  // a sync generation would end with requestDone() -> deadlock, and
1483  // we can not really know if the generator can do async requests
1484  m_executingPixmapRequests.push_back( request );
1485  m_pixmapRequestsMutex.unlock();
1486  m_generator->generatePixmap( request );
1487  }
1488  else
1489  {
1490  m_pixmapRequestsMutex.unlock();
1491  // pino (7/4/2006): set the polling interval from 10 to 30
1492  QTimer::singleShot( 30, m_parent, SLOT(sendGeneratorPixmapRequest()) );
1493  }
1494 }

1526 void DocumentPrivate::slotGeneratorConfigChanged( const QString& )
1527 {
1528  if ( !m_generator )
1529  return;
1530 
1531  // reparse generator config and if something changed clear Pages
1532  bool configchanged = false;
1533  QHash< QString, GeneratorInfo >::iterator it = m_loadedGenerators.begin(), itEnd = m_loadedGenerators.end();
1534  for ( ; it != itEnd; ++it )
1535  {
1536  Okular::ConfigInterface * iface = generatorConfig( it.value() );
1537  if ( iface )
1538  {
1539  bool it_changed = iface->reparseConfig();
1540  if ( it_changed && ( m_generator == it.value().generator ) )
1541  configchanged = true;
1542  }
1543  }
1544  if ( configchanged )
1545  {
1546  // invalidate pixmaps
1547  QVector<Page*>::const_iterator it = m_pagesVector.constBegin(), end = m_pagesVector.constEnd();
1548  for ( ; it != end; ++it ) {
1549  (*it)->deletePixmaps();
1550  }
1551 
1552  // [MEM] remove allocation descriptors
1553  qDeleteAll( m_allocatedPixmaps );
1554  m_allocatedPixmaps.clear();
1555  m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory = 0;
1556 
1557  // send reload signals to observers
1558  foreachObserverD( notifyContentsCleared( DocumentObserver::Pixmap ) );
1559  }
1560 
1561  // free memory if in 'low' profile
1562  if ( SettingsCore::memoryLevel() == SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Low &&
1563  !m_allocatedPixmaps.isEmpty() && !m_pagesVector.isEmpty() )
1564  cleanupPixmapMemory();
1565 }

1567 void DocumentPrivate::refreshPixmaps( int pageNumber )
1568 {
1569  Page* page = m_pagesVector.value( pageNumber, 0 );
1570  if ( !page )
1571  return;
1572 
1573  QLinkedList< Okular::PixmapRequest * > requestedPixmaps;
1574  QMap< DocumentObserver*, PagePrivate::PixmapObject >::ConstIterator it = page->d->m_pixmaps.constBegin(), itEnd = page->d->m_pixmaps.constEnd();
1575  for ( ; it != itEnd; ++it )
1576  {
1577  QSize size = (*it).m_pixmap->size();
1578  PixmapRequest * p = new PixmapRequest( it.key(), pageNumber, size.width(), size.height(), 1, PixmapRequest::Asynchronous );
1579  p->d->mForce = true;
1580  requestedPixmaps.push_back( p );
1581  }
1582 
1583  foreach (DocumentObserver *observer, m_observers)
1584  {
1585  TilesManager *tilesManager = page->d->tilesManager( observer );
1586  if ( tilesManager )
1587  {
1588  tilesManager->markDirty();
1589 
1590  PixmapRequest * p = new PixmapRequest( observer, pageNumber, tilesManager->width(), tilesManager->height(), 1, PixmapRequest::Asynchronous );
1591 
1592  NormalizedRect tilesRect;
1593 
1594  // Get the visible page rect
1595  NormalizedRect visibleRect;
1596  QVector< Okular::VisiblePageRect * >::const_iterator vIt = m_pageRects.constBegin(), vEnd = m_pageRects.constEnd();
1597  for ( ; vIt != vEnd; ++vIt )
1598  {
1599  if ( (*vIt)->pageNumber == pageNumber )
1600  {
1601  visibleRect = (*vIt)->rect;
1602  break;
1603  }
1604  }
1605 
1606  if ( !visibleRect.isNull() )
1607  {
1608  p->setNormalizedRect( visibleRect );
1609  p->setTile( true );
1610  p->d->mForce = true;
1611  requestedPixmaps.push_back( p );
1612  }
1613  else
1614  {
1615  delete p;
1616  }
1617  }
1618  }
1619 
1620  if ( !requestedPixmaps.isEmpty() )
1621  m_parent->requestPixmaps( requestedPixmaps, Okular::Document::NoOption );
1622 }

1635 void DocumentPrivate::doContinueDirectionMatchSearch(void *doContinueDirectionMatchSearchStruct)
1636 {
1637  DoContinueDirectionMatchSearchStruct *searchStruct = static_cast<DoContinueDirectionMatchSearchStruct *>(doContinueDirectionMatchSearchStruct);
1638  RunningSearch *search = m_searches.value(searchStruct->searchID);
1639 
1640  if ((m_searchCancelled && !searchStruct->match) || !search)
1641  {
1642  // if the user cancelled but he just got a match, give him the match!
1643  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
1644 
1645  if (search) search->isCurrentlySearching = false;
1646 
1647  emit m_parent->searchFinished( searchStruct->searchID, Document::SearchCancelled );
1648  delete searchStruct->pagesToNotify;
1649  delete searchStruct;
1650  return;
1651  }
1652 
1653  bool doContinue = false;
1654  // if no match found, loop through the whole doc, starting from currentPage
1655  if ( !searchStruct->match )
1656  {
1657  const int pageCount = m_pagesVector.count();
1658  if (searchStruct->pagesDone < pageCount)
1659  {
1660  doContinue = true;
1661  if ( searchStruct->currentPage >= pageCount || searchStruct->currentPage < 0 )
1662  {
1663  const QString question = searchStruct->forward ? i18n("End of document reached.\nContinue from the beginning?") : i18n("Beginning of document reached.\nContinue from the bottom?");
1664  if ( searchStruct->noDialogs || KMessageBox::questionYesNo(m_parent->widget(), question, QString(), KStandardGuiItem::cont(), KStandardGuiItem::cancel()) == KMessageBox::Yes )
1665  searchStruct->currentPage = searchStruct->forward ? 0 : pageCount - 1;
1666  else
1667  doContinue = false;
1668  }
1669  }
1670  }
1671 
1672  if (doContinue)
1673  {
1674  // get page
1675  Page * page = m_pagesVector[ searchStruct->currentPage ];
1676  // request search page if needed
1677  if ( !page->hasTextPage() )
1678  m_parent->requestTextPage( page->number() );
1679 
1680  // if found a match on the current page, end the loop
1681  searchStruct->match = page->findText( searchStruct->searchID, searchStruct->text, searchStruct->forward ? FromTop : FromBottom, searchStruct->caseSensitivity );
1682 
1683  if ( !searchStruct->match )
1684  {
1685  if (searchStruct->forward) searchStruct->currentPage++;
1686  else searchStruct->currentPage--;
1687  searchStruct->pagesDone++;
1688  }
1689  else
1690  {
1691  searchStruct->pagesDone = 1;
1692  }
1693 
1694  // Both of the previous if branches need to call doContinueDirectionMatchSearch
1695  QMetaObject::invokeMethod(m_parent, "doContinueDirectionMatchSearch", Qt::QueuedConnection, Q_ARG(void *, searchStruct));
1696  }
1697  else
1698  {
1699  doProcessSearchMatch( searchStruct->match, search, searchStruct->pagesToNotify, searchStruct->currentPage, searchStruct->searchID, searchStruct->moveViewport, searchStruct->color );
1700  delete searchStruct;
1701  }
1702 }
1703 
1704 void DocumentPrivate::doProcessSearchMatch( RegularAreaRect *match, RunningSearch *search, QSet< int > *pagesToNotify, int currentPage, int searchID, bool moveViewport, const QColor & color )
1705 {
1706  // reset cursor to previous shape
1707  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
1708 
1709  bool foundAMatch = false;
1710 
1711  search->isCurrentlySearching = false;
1712 
1713  // if a match has been found..
1714  if ( match )
1715  {
1716  // update the RunningSearch structure adding this match..
1717  foundAMatch = true;
1718  search->continueOnPage = currentPage;
1719  search->continueOnMatch = *match;
1720  search->highlightedPages.insert( currentPage );
1721  // ..add highlight to the page..
1722  m_pagesVector[ currentPage ]->d->setHighlight( searchID, match, color );
1723 
1724  // ..queue page for notifying changes..
1725  pagesToNotify->insert( currentPage );
1726 
1727  // Create a normalized rectangle around the search match that includes a 5% buffer on all sides.
1728  const Okular::NormalizedRect matchRectWithBuffer = Okular::NormalizedRect( match->first().left - 0.05,
1729  match->first().top - 0.05,
1730  match->first().right + 0.05,
1731  match->first().bottom + 0.05 );
1732 
1733  const bool matchRectFullyVisible = isNormalizedRectangleFullyVisible( matchRectWithBuffer, currentPage );
1734 
1735  // ..move the viewport to show the first of the searched word sequence centered
1736  if ( moveViewport && !matchRectFullyVisible )
1737  {
1738  DocumentViewport searchViewport( currentPage );
1739  searchViewport.rePos.enabled = true;
1740  searchViewport.rePos.normalizedX = (match->first().left + match->first().right) / 2.0;
1741  searchViewport.rePos.normalizedY = (match->first().top + match->first().bottom) / 2.0;
1742  m_parent->setViewport( searchViewport, 0, true );
1743  }
1744  delete match;
1745  }
1746 #if 0
1747  else if ( !noDialogs )
1748  KMessageBox::information( m_parent->widget(), i18n( "No matches found for '%1'.", text ) );
1749 #endif
1750 
1751  // notify observers about highlights changes
1752  foreach(int pageNumber, *pagesToNotify)
1753  foreach(DocumentObserver *observer, m_observers)
1754  observer->notifyPageChanged( pageNumber, DocumentObserver::Highlights );
1755 
1756  if (foundAMatch) emit m_parent->searchFinished( searchID, Document::MatchFound );
1757  else emit m_parent->searchFinished( searchID, Document::NoMatchFound );
1758 
1759  delete pagesToNotify;
1760 }
1761 
1762 void DocumentPrivate::doContinueAllDocumentSearch(void *pagesToNotifySet, void *pageMatchesMap, int currentPage, int searchID, const QString & text, int theCaseSensitivity, const QColor & color)
1763 {
1764  QMap< Page *, QVector<RegularAreaRect *> > *pageMatches = static_cast< QMap< Page *, QVector<RegularAreaRect *> > * >(pageMatchesMap);
1765  Qt::CaseSensitivity caseSensitivity = static_cast<Qt::CaseSensitivity>(theCaseSensitivity);
1766  QSet< int > *pagesToNotify = static_cast< QSet< int > * >( pagesToNotifySet );
1767  RunningSearch *search = m_searches.value(searchID);
1768 
1769  if (m_searchCancelled || !search)
1770  {
1771  typedef QVector<RegularAreaRect *> MatchesVector;
1772 
1773  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
1774 
1775  if (search) search->isCurrentlySearching = false;
1776 
1777  emit m_parent->searchFinished( searchID, Document::SearchCancelled );
1778  foreach(const MatchesVector &mv, *pageMatches) qDeleteAll(mv);
1779  delete pageMatches;
1780  delete pagesToNotify;
1781  return;
1782  }
1783 
1784  if (currentPage < m_pagesVector.count())
1785  {
1786  // get page (from the first to the last)
1787  Page *page = m_pagesVector.at(currentPage);
1788  int pageNumber = page->number(); // redundant? is it == currentPage ?
1789 
1790  // request search page if needed
1791  if ( !page->hasTextPage() )
1792  m_parent->requestTextPage( pageNumber );
1793 
1794  // loop on a page adding highlights for all found items
1795  RegularAreaRect * lastMatch = 0;
1796  while ( 1 )
1797  {
1798  if ( lastMatch )
1799  lastMatch = page->findText( searchID, text, NextResult, caseSensitivity, lastMatch );
1800  else
1801  lastMatch = page->findText( searchID, text, FromTop, caseSensitivity );
1802 
1803  if ( !lastMatch )
1804  break;
1805 
1806  // add highligh rect to the matches map
1807  (*pageMatches)[page].append(lastMatch);
1808  }
1809  delete lastMatch;
1810 
1811  QMetaObject::invokeMethod(m_parent, "doContinueAllDocumentSearch", Qt::QueuedConnection, Q_ARG(void *, pagesToNotifySet), Q_ARG(void *, pageMatches), Q_ARG(int, currentPage + 1), Q_ARG(int, searchID), Q_ARG(QString, text), Q_ARG(int, caseSensitivity), Q_ARG(QColor, color));
1812  }
1813  else
1814  {
1815  // reset cursor to previous shape
1816  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
1817 
1818  search->isCurrentlySearching = false;
1819  bool foundAMatch = pageMatches->count() != 0;
1820  QMap< Page *, QVector<RegularAreaRect *> >::const_iterator it, itEnd;
1821  it = pageMatches->constBegin();
1822  itEnd = pageMatches->constEnd();
1823  for ( ; it != itEnd; ++it)
1824  {
1825  foreach(RegularAreaRect *match, it.value())
1826  {
1827  it.key()->d->setHighlight( searchID, match, color );
1828  delete match;
1829  }
1830  search->highlightedPages.insert( it.key()->number() );
1831  pagesToNotify->insert( it.key()->number() );
1832  }
1833 
1834  foreach(DocumentObserver *observer, m_observers)
1835  observer->notifySetup( m_pagesVector, 0 );
1836 
1837  // notify observers about highlights changes
1838  foreach(int pageNumber, *pagesToNotify)
1839  foreach(DocumentObserver *observer, m_observers)
1840  observer->notifyPageChanged( pageNumber, DocumentObserver::Highlights );
1841 
1842  if (foundAMatch) emit m_parent->searchFinished(searchID, Document::MatchFound );
1843  else emit m_parent->searchFinished( searchID, Document::NoMatchFound );
1844 
1845  delete pageMatches;
1846  delete pagesToNotify;
1847  }
1848 }
1849 
1850 void DocumentPrivate::doContinueGooglesDocumentSearch(void *pagesToNotifySet, void *pageMatchesMap, int currentPage, int searchID, const QStringList & words, int theCaseSensitivity, const QColor & color, bool matchAll)
1851 {
1852  typedef QPair<RegularAreaRect *, QColor> MatchColor;
1853  QMap< Page *, QVector<MatchColor> > *pageMatches = static_cast< QMap< Page *, QVector<MatchColor> > * >(pageMatchesMap);
1854  Qt::CaseSensitivity caseSensitivity = static_cast<Qt::CaseSensitivity>(theCaseSensitivity);
1855  QSet< int > *pagesToNotify = static_cast< QSet< int > * >( pagesToNotifySet );
1856  RunningSearch *search = m_searches.value(searchID);
1857 
1858  if (m_searchCancelled || !search)
1859  {
1860  typedef QVector<MatchColor> MatchesVector;
1861 
1862  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
1863 
1864  if (search) search->isCurrentlySearching = false;
1865 
1866  emit m_parent->searchFinished( searchID, Document::SearchCancelled );
1867 
1868  foreach(const MatchesVector &mv, *pageMatches)
1869  {
1870  foreach(const MatchColor &mc, mv) delete mc.first;
1871  }
1872  delete pageMatches;
1873  delete pagesToNotify;
1874  return;
1875  }
1876 
1877  const int wordCount = words.count();
1878  const int hueStep = (wordCount > 1) ? (60 / (wordCount - 1)) : 60;
1879  int baseHue, baseSat, baseVal;
1880  color.getHsv( &baseHue, &baseSat, &baseVal );
1881 
1882  if (currentPage < m_pagesVector.count())
1883  {
1884  // get page (from the first to the last)
1885  Page *page = m_pagesVector.at(currentPage);
1886  int pageNumber = page->number(); // redundant? is it == currentPage ?
1887 
1888  // request search page if needed
1889  if ( !page->hasTextPage() )
1890  m_parent->requestTextPage( pageNumber );
1891 
1892  // loop on a page adding highlights for all found items
1893  bool allMatched = wordCount > 0,
1894  anyMatched = false;
1895  for ( int w = 0; w < wordCount; w++ )
1896  {
1897  const QString &word = words[ w ];
1898  int newHue = baseHue - w * hueStep;
1899  if ( newHue < 0 )
1900  newHue += 360;
1901  QColor wordColor = QColor::fromHsv( newHue, baseSat, baseVal );
1902  RegularAreaRect * lastMatch = 0;
1903  // add all highlights for current word
1904  bool wordMatched = false;
1905  while ( 1 )
1906  {
1907  if ( lastMatch )
1908  lastMatch = page->findText( searchID, word, NextResult, caseSensitivity, lastMatch );
1909  else
1910  lastMatch = page->findText( searchID, word, FromTop, caseSensitivity);
1911 
1912  if ( !lastMatch )
1913  break;
1914 
1915  // add highligh rect to the matches map
1916  (*pageMatches)[page].append(MatchColor(lastMatch, wordColor));
1917  wordMatched = true;
1918  }
1919  allMatched = allMatched && wordMatched;
1920  anyMatched = anyMatched || wordMatched;
1921  }
1922 
1923  // if not all words are present in page, remove partial highlights
1924  if ( !allMatched && matchAll )
1925  {
1926  QVector<MatchColor> &matches = (*pageMatches)[page];
1927  foreach(const MatchColor &mc, matches) delete mc.first;
1928  pageMatches->remove(page);
1929  }
1930 
1931  QMetaObject::invokeMethod(m_parent, "doContinueGooglesDocumentSearch", Qt::QueuedConnection, Q_ARG(void *, pagesToNotifySet), Q_ARG(void *, pageMatches), Q_ARG(int, currentPage + 1), Q_ARG(int, searchID), Q_ARG(QStringList, words), Q_ARG(int, caseSensitivity), Q_ARG(QColor, color), Q_ARG(bool, matchAll));
1932  }
1933  else
1934  {
1935  // reset cursor to previous shape
1936  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
1937 
1938  search->isCurrentlySearching = false;
1939  bool foundAMatch = pageMatches->count() != 0;
1940  QMap< Page *, QVector<MatchColor> >::const_iterator it, itEnd;
1941  it = pageMatches->constBegin();
1942  itEnd = pageMatches->constEnd();
1943  for ( ; it != itEnd; ++it)
1944  {
1945  foreach(const MatchColor &mc, it.value())
1946  {
1947  it.key()->d->setHighlight( searchID, mc.first, mc.second );
1948  delete mc.first;
1949  }
1950  search->highlightedPages.insert( it.key()->number() );
1951  pagesToNotify->insert( it.key()->number() );
1952  }
1953 
1954  // send page lists to update observers (since some filter on bookmarks)
1955  foreach(DocumentObserver *observer, m_observers)
1956  observer->notifySetup( m_pagesVector, 0 );
1957 
1958  // notify observers about highlights changes
1959  foreach(int pageNumber, *pagesToNotify)
1960  foreach(DocumentObserver *observer, m_observers)
1961  observer->notifyPageChanged( pageNumber, DocumentObserver::Highlights );
1962 
1963  if (foundAMatch) emit m_parent->searchFinished( searchID, Document::MatchFound );
1964  else emit m_parent->searchFinished( searchID, Document::NoMatchFound );
1965 
1966  delete pageMatches;
1967  delete pagesToNotify;
1968  }
1969 }

1971 QVariant DocumentPrivate::documentMetaData( const QString &key, const QVariant &option ) const
1972 {
1973  if ( key == QLatin1String( "PaperColor" ) )
1974  {
1975  bool giveDefault = option.toBool();
1976  // load paper color from Settings, or use the default color (white)
1977  // if we were told to do so
1978  QColor color;
1979  if ( ( SettingsCore::renderMode() == SettingsCore::EnumRenderMode::Paper )
1980  && SettingsCore::changeColors() )
1981  {
1982  color = SettingsCore::paperColor();
1983  }
1984  else if ( giveDefault )
1985  {
1986  color = Qt::white;
1987  }
1988  return color;
1989  }
1990  else if ( key == QLatin1String( "TextAntialias" ) )
1991  {
1992  switch ( SettingsCore::textAntialias() )
1993  {
1994  case SettingsCore::EnumTextAntialias::Enabled:
1995  return true;
1996  break;
1997 #if 0
1998  case Settings::EnumTextAntialias::UseKDESettings:
1999  // TODO: read the KDE configuration
2000  return true;
2001  break;
2002 #endif
2003  case SettingsCore::EnumTextAntialias::Disabled:
2004  return false;
2005  break;
2006  }
2007  }
2008  else if ( key == QLatin1String( "GraphicsAntialias" ) )
2009  {
2010  switch ( SettingsCore::graphicsAntialias() )
2011  {
2012  case SettingsCore::EnumGraphicsAntialias::Enabled:
2013  return true;
2014  break;
2015  case SettingsCore::EnumGraphicsAntialias::Disabled:
2016  return false;
2017  break;
2018  }
2019  }
2020  else if ( key == QLatin1String( "TextHinting" ) )
2021  {
2022  switch ( SettingsCore::textHinting() )
2023  {
2024  case SettingsCore::EnumTextHinting::Enabled:
2025  return true;
2026  break;
2027  case SettingsCore::EnumTextHinting::Disabled:
2028  return false;
2029  break;
2030  }
2031  }
2032  return QVariant();
2033 }

2035 bool DocumentPrivate::isNormalizedRectangleFullyVisible( const Okular::NormalizedRect & rectOfInterest, int rectPage )
2036 {
2037  bool rectFullyVisible = false;
2038  const QVector<Okular::VisiblePageRect *> & visibleRects = m_parent->visiblePageRects();
2039  QVector<Okular::VisiblePageRect *>::const_iterator vEnd = visibleRects.end();
2040  QVector<Okular::VisiblePageRect *>::const_iterator vIt = visibleRects.begin();
2041 
2042  for ( ; ( vIt != vEnd ) && !rectFullyVisible; ++vIt )
2043  {
2044  if ( (*vIt)->pageNumber == rectPage &&
2045  (*vIt)->rect.contains( rectOfInterest.left, rectOfInterest.top ) &&
2046  (*vIt)->rect.contains( rectOfInterest.right, rectOfInterest.bottom ) )
2047  {
2048  rectFullyVisible = true;
2049  }
2050  }
2051  return rectFullyVisible;
2052 }

2094 class kMimeTypeMoreThan {
2095 public:
2096  kMimeTypeMoreThan( const KMimeType::Ptr &mime ) : _mime( mime ) {}
2097  bool operator()( const KService::Ptr &s1, const KService::Ptr &s2 )
2098  {
2099  const QString mimeName = _mime->name();
2100  if (s1->mimeTypes().contains( mimeName ) && !s2->mimeTypes().contains( mimeName ))
2101  return true;
2102  else if (s2->mimeTypes().contains( mimeName ) && !s1->mimeTypes().contains( mimeName ))
2103  return false;
2104  return s1->property( "X-KDE-Priority" ).toInt() > s2->property( "X-KDE-Priority" ).toInt();
2105  }
2106 
2107 private:
2108  const KMimeType::Ptr &_mime;
2109 };
2110 
2111 bool Document::openDocument( const QString & docFile, const KUrl& url, const KMimeType::Ptr &_mime )
2112 {
2113  KMimeType::Ptr mime = _mime;
2114  QByteArray filedata;
2115  qint64 document_size = -1;
2116  bool isstdin = url.fileName( KUrl::ObeyTrailingSlash ) == QLatin1String( "-" );
2117  bool triedMimeFromFileContent = false;
2118  if ( !isstdin )
2119  {
2120  if ( mime.count() <= 0 )
2121  return false;
2122 
2123  // docFile is always local so we can use QFileInfo on it
2124  QFileInfo fileReadTest( docFile );
2125  if ( fileReadTest.isFile() && !fileReadTest.isReadable() )
2126  {
2127  d->m_docFileName.clear();
2128  return false;
2129  }
2130  // determine the related "xml document-info" filename
2131  d->m_url = url;
2132  d->m_docFileName = docFile;
2133  if ( url.isLocalFile() && !d->m_archiveData )
2134  {
2135  QString fn = url.fileName();
2136  document_size = fileReadTest.size();
2137  fn = QString::number( document_size ) + '.' + fn + ".xml";
2138  QString newokular = "okular/docdata/" + fn;
2139  QString newokularfile = KStandardDirs::locateLocal( "data", newokular );
2140  if ( !QFile::exists( newokularfile ) )
2141  {
2142  QString oldkpdf = "kpdf/" + fn;
2143  QString oldkpdffile = KStandardDirs::locateLocal( "data", oldkpdf );
2144  if ( QFile::exists( oldkpdffile ) )
2145  {
2146  // ### copy or move?
2147  if ( !QFile::copy( oldkpdffile, newokularfile ) )
2148  return false;
2149  }
2150  }
2151  d->m_xmlFileName = newokularfile;
2152  }
2153  }
2154  else
2155  {
2156  QFile qstdin;
2157  qstdin.open( stdin, QIODevice::ReadOnly );
2158  filedata = qstdin.readAll();
2159  mime = KMimeType::findByContent( filedata );
2160  if ( !mime || mime->name() == QLatin1String( "application/octet-stream" ) )
2161  return false;
2162  document_size = filedata.size();
2163  triedMimeFromFileContent = true;
2164  }
2165 
2166  // 0. load Generator
2167  // request only valid non-disabled plugins suitable for the mimetype
2168  QString constraint("([X-KDE-Priority] > 0) and (exist Library)") ;
2169  KService::List offers = KMimeTypeTrader::self()->query(mime->name(),"okular/Generator",constraint);
2170  if ( offers.isEmpty() && !triedMimeFromFileContent )
2171  {
2172  KMimeType::Ptr newmime = KMimeType::findByFileContent( docFile );
2173  triedMimeFromFileContent = true;
2174  if ( newmime->name() != mime->name() )
2175  {
2176  mime = newmime;
2177  offers = KMimeTypeTrader::self()->query( mime->name(), "okular/Generator", constraint );
2178  }
2179  if ( offers.isEmpty() )
2180  {
2181  // There's still no offers, do a final mime search based on the filename
2182  // We need this because sometimes (e.g. when downloading from a webserver) the mimetype we
2183  // use is the one fed by the server, that may be wrong
2184  newmime = KMimeType::findByUrl( docFile );
2185  if ( newmime->name() != mime->name() )
2186  {
2187  mime = newmime;
2188  offers = KMimeTypeTrader::self()->query( mime->name(), "okular/Generator", constraint );
2189  }
2190  }
2191  }
2192  if (offers.isEmpty())
2193  {
2194  emit error( i18n( "Can not find a plugin which is able to handle the document being passed." ), -1 );
2195  kWarning(OkularDebug).nospace() << "No plugin for mimetype '" << mime->name() << "'.";
2196  return false;
2197  }
2198  int hRank=0;
2199  // best ranked offer search
2200  int offercount = offers.count();
2201  if ( offercount > 1 )
2202  {
2203  // sort the offers: the offers with an higher priority come before
2204  qStableSort( offers.begin(), offers.end(), kMimeTypeMoreThan( mime ) );
2205 
2206  if ( SettingsCore::chooseGenerators() )
2207  {
2208  QStringList list;
2209  for ( int i = 0; i < offercount; ++i )
2210  {
2211  list << offers.at(i)->name();
2212  }
2213 
2214  ChooseEngineDialog choose( list, mime, widget() );
2215 
2216  if ( choose.exec() == QDialog::Rejected )
2217  return false;
2218 
2219  hRank = choose.selectedGenerator();
2220  }
2221  }
2222 
2223  KService::Ptr offer = offers.at( hRank );
2224  // 1. load Document
2225  bool openOk = d->openDocumentInternal( offer, isstdin, docFile, filedata );
2226  if ( !openOk && !triedMimeFromFileContent )
2227  {
2228  KMimeType::Ptr newmime = KMimeType::findByFileContent( docFile );
2229  triedMimeFromFileContent = true;
2230  if ( newmime->name() != mime->name() )
2231  {
2232  mime = newmime;
2233  offers = KMimeTypeTrader::self()->query( mime->name(), "okular/Generator", constraint );
2234  if ( !offers.isEmpty() )
2235  {
2236  offer = offers.first();
2237  openOk = d->openDocumentInternal( offer, isstdin, docFile, filedata );
2238  }
2239  }
2240  }
2241  if ( !openOk )
2242  {
2243  return false;
2244  }
2245 
2246  d->m_generatorName = offer->name();
2247  d->m_pageController = new PageController();
2248  connect( d->m_pageController, SIGNAL(rotationFinished(int,Okular::Page*)),
2249  this, SLOT(rotationFinished(int,Okular::Page*)) );
2250 
2251  bool containsExternalAnnotations = false;
2252  foreach ( Page * p, d->m_pagesVector )
2253  {
2254  p->d->m_doc = d;
2255  if ( !p->annotations().empty() )
2256  containsExternalAnnotations = true;
2257  }
2258 
2259  // Be quiet while restoring local annotations
2260  d->m_showWarningLimitedAnnotSupport = false;
2261  d->m_annotationsNeedSaveAs = false;
2262 
2263  // 2. load Additional Data (bookmarks, local annotations and metadata) about the document
2264  if ( d->m_archiveData )
2265  {
2266  d->loadDocumentInfo( d->m_archiveData->metadataFileName );
2267  d->m_annotationsNeedSaveAs = true;
2268  }
2269  else
2270  {
2271  d->loadDocumentInfo();
2272  d->m_annotationsNeedSaveAs = ( d->canAddAnnotationsNatively() && containsExternalAnnotations );
2273  }
2274 
2275  d->m_showWarningLimitedAnnotSupport = true;
2276  d->m_bookmarkManager->setUrl( d->m_url );
2277 
2278  // 3. setup observers inernal lists and data
2279  foreachObserver( notifySetup( d->m_pagesVector, DocumentObserver::DocumentChanged ) );
2280 
2281  // 4. set initial page (restoring the page saved in xml if loaded)
2282  DocumentViewport loadedViewport = (*d->m_viewportIterator);
2283  if ( loadedViewport.isValid() )
2284  {
2285  (*d->m_viewportIterator) = DocumentViewport();
2286  if ( loadedViewport.pageNumber >= (int)d->m_pagesVector.size() )
2287  loadedViewport.pageNumber = d->m_pagesVector.size() - 1;
2288  }
2289  else
2290  loadedViewport.pageNumber = 0;
2291  setViewport( loadedViewport );
2292 
2293  // start bookmark saver timer
2294  if ( !d->m_saveBookmarksTimer )
2295  {
2296  d->m_saveBookmarksTimer = new QTimer( this );
2297  connect( d->m_saveBookmarksTimer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(saveDocumentInfo()) );
2298  }
2299  d->m_saveBookmarksTimer->start( 5 * 60 * 1000 );
2300 
2301  // start memory check timer
2302  if ( !d->m_memCheckTimer )
2303  {
2304  d->m_memCheckTimer = new QTimer( this );
2305  connect( d->m_memCheckTimer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(slotTimedMemoryCheck()) );
2306  }
2307  d->m_memCheckTimer->start( 2000 );
2308 
2309  const DocumentViewport nextViewport = d->nextDocumentViewport();
2310  if ( nextViewport.isValid() )
2311  {
2312  setViewport( nextViewport );
2313  d->m_nextDocumentViewport = DocumentViewport();
2314  d->m_nextDocumentDestination = QString();
2315  }
2316 
2317  AudioPlayer::instance()->d->m_currentDocument = isstdin ? KUrl() : d->m_url;
2318  d->m_docSize = document_size;
2319 
2320  const QStringList docScripts = d->m_generator->metaData( "DocumentScripts", "JavaScript" ).toStringList();
2321  if ( !docScripts.isEmpty() )
2322  {
2323  d->m_scripter = new Scripter( d );
2324  Q_FOREACH ( const QString &docscript, docScripts )
2325  {
2326  d->m_scripter->execute( JavaScript, docscript );
2327  }
2328  }
2329 
2330  return true;
2331 }
