2345 void Document::closeDocument()
2346 {
2347  // check if there's anything to close...
2348  if ( !d->m_generator )
2349  return;
2350 
2351  delete d->m_pageController;
2352  d->m_pageController = 0;
2353 
2354  delete d->m_scripter;
2355  d->m_scripter = 0;
2356 
2357  // remove requests left in queue
2358  d->m_pixmapRequestsMutex.lock();
2359  QLinkedList< PixmapRequest * >::const_iterator sIt = d->m_pixmapRequestsStack.constBegin();
2360  QLinkedList< PixmapRequest * >::const_iterator sEnd = d->m_pixmapRequestsStack.constEnd();
2361  for ( ; sIt != sEnd; ++sIt )
2362  delete *sIt;
2363  d->m_pixmapRequestsStack.clear();
2364  d->m_pixmapRequestsMutex.unlock();
2365 
2366  QEventLoop loop;
2367  bool startEventLoop = false;
2368  do
2369  {
2370  d->m_pixmapRequestsMutex.lock();
2371  startEventLoop = !d->m_executingPixmapRequests.isEmpty();
2372  d->m_pixmapRequestsMutex.unlock();
2373  if ( startEventLoop )
2374  {
2375  d->m_closingLoop = &loop;
2376  loop.exec();
2377  d->m_closingLoop = 0;
2378  }
2379  }
2380  while ( startEventLoop );
2381 
2382  if ( d->m_fontThread )
2383  {
2384  disconnect( d->m_fontThread, 0, this, 0 );
2385  d->m_fontThread->stopExtraction();
2386  d->m_fontThread->wait();
2387  d->m_fontThread = 0;
2388  }
2389 
2390  // stop any audio playback
2391  AudioPlayer::instance()->stopPlaybacks();
2392 
2393  // close the current document and save document info if a document is still opened
2394  if ( d->m_generator && d->m_pagesVector.size() > 0 )
2395  {
2396  d->saveDocumentInfo();
2397  d->m_generator->closeDocument();
2398  }
2399 
2400  // stop timers
2401  if ( d->m_memCheckTimer )
2402  d->m_memCheckTimer->stop();
2403  if ( d->m_saveBookmarksTimer )
2404  d->m_saveBookmarksTimer->stop();
2405 
2406  if ( d->m_generator )
2407  {
2408  // disconnect the generator from this document ...
2409  d->m_generator->d_func()->m_document = 0;
2410  // .. and this document from the generator signals
2411  disconnect( d->m_generator, 0, this, 0 );
2412 
2413  QHash< QString, GeneratorInfo >::const_iterator genIt = d->m_loadedGenerators.constFind( d->m_generatorName );
2414  Q_ASSERT( genIt != d->m_loadedGenerators.constEnd() );
2415  if ( !genIt.value().catalogName.isEmpty() && !genIt.value().config )
2416  KGlobal::locale()->removeCatalog( genIt.value().catalogName );
2417  }
2418  d->m_generator = 0;
2419  d->m_generatorName = QString();
2420  d->m_url = KUrl();
2421  d->m_docFileName = QString();
2422  d->m_xmlFileName = QString();
2423  delete d->m_tempFile;
2424  d->m_tempFile = 0;
2425  delete d->m_archiveData;
2426  d->m_archiveData = 0;
2427  d->m_docSize = -1;
2428  d->m_exportCached = false;
2429  d->m_exportFormats.clear();
2430  d->m_exportToText = ExportFormat();
2431  d->m_fontsCached = false;
2432  d->m_fontsCache.clear();
2433  d->m_rotation = Rotation0;
2434 
2435  // send an empty list to observers (to free their data)
2436  foreachObserver( notifySetup( QVector< Page * >(), DocumentObserver::DocumentChanged ) );
2437 
2438  // delete pages and clear 'd->m_pagesVector' container
2439  QVector< Page * >::const_iterator pIt = d->m_pagesVector.constBegin();
2440  QVector< Page * >::const_iterator pEnd = d->m_pagesVector.constEnd();
2441  for ( ; pIt != pEnd; ++pIt )
2442  delete *pIt;
2443  d->m_pagesVector.clear();
2444 
2445  // clear 'memory allocation' descriptors
2446  qDeleteAll( d->m_allocatedPixmaps );
2447  d->m_allocatedPixmaps.clear();
2448 
2449  // clear 'running searches' descriptors
2450  QMap< int, RunningSearch * >::const_iterator rIt = d->m_searches.constBegin();
2451  QMap< int, RunningSearch * >::const_iterator rEnd = d->m_searches.constEnd();
2452  for ( ; rIt != rEnd; ++rIt )
2453  delete *rIt;
2454  d->m_searches.clear();
2455 
2456  // clear the visible areas and notify the observers
2457  QVector< VisiblePageRect * >::const_iterator vIt = d->m_pageRects.constBegin();
2458  QVector< VisiblePageRect * >::const_iterator vEnd = d->m_pageRects.constEnd();
2459  for ( ; vIt != vEnd; ++vIt )
2460  delete *vIt;
2461  d->m_pageRects.clear();
2462  foreachObserver( notifyVisibleRectsChanged() );
2463 
2464  // reset internal variables
2465 
2466  d->m_viewportHistory.clear();
2467  d->m_viewportHistory.append( DocumentViewport() );
2468  d->m_viewportIterator = d->m_viewportHistory.begin();
2469  d->m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory = 0;
2470  d->m_allocatedTextPagesFifo.clear();
2471  d->m_pageSize = PageSize();
2472  d->m_pageSizes.clear();
2473 
2474  delete d->m_documentInfo;
2475  d->m_documentInfo = 0;
2476 
2477  AudioPlayer::instance()->d->m_currentDocument = KUrl();
2478 
2479  d->m_undoStack->clear();
2480 }
2481 
2482 void Document::addObserver( DocumentObserver * pObserver )
2483 {
2484  Q_ASSERT( !d->m_observers.contains( pObserver ) );
2485  d->m_observers << pObserver;
2486 
2487  // if the observer is added while a document is already opened, tell it
2488  if ( !d->m_pagesVector.isEmpty() )
2489  {
2490  pObserver->notifySetup( d->m_pagesVector, DocumentObserver::DocumentChanged );
2491  pObserver->notifyViewportChanged( false /*disables smoothMove*/ );
2492  }
2493 }
2494 
2495 void Document::removeObserver( DocumentObserver * pObserver )
2496 {
2497  // remove observer from the map. it won't receive notifications anymore
2498  if ( d->m_observers.contains( pObserver ) )
2499  {
2500  // free observer's pixmap data
2501  QVector<Page*>::const_iterator it = d->m_pagesVector.constBegin(), end = d->m_pagesVector.constEnd();
2502  for ( ; it != end; ++it )
2503  (*it)->deletePixmap( pObserver );
2504 
2505  // [MEM] free observer's allocation descriptors
2506  QLinkedList< AllocatedPixmap * >::iterator aIt = d->m_allocatedPixmaps.begin();
2507  QLinkedList< AllocatedPixmap * >::iterator aEnd = d->m_allocatedPixmaps.end();
2508  while ( aIt != aEnd )
2509  {
2510  AllocatedPixmap * p = *aIt;
2511  if ( p->observer == pObserver )
2512  {
2513  aIt = d->m_allocatedPixmaps.erase( aIt );
2514  delete p;
2515  }
2516  else
2517  ++aIt;
2518  }
2519 
2520  // delete observer entry from the map
2521  d->m_observers.remove( pObserver );
2522  }
2523 }
2524 
2525 void Document::reparseConfig()
2526 {
2527  // reparse generator config and if something changed clear Pages
2528  bool configchanged = false;
2529  if ( d->m_generator )
2530  {
2531  Okular::ConfigInterface * iface = qobject_cast< Okular::ConfigInterface * >( d->m_generator );
2532  if ( iface )
2533  configchanged = iface->reparseConfig();
2534  }
2535  if ( configchanged )
2536  {
2537  // invalidate pixmaps
2538  QVector<Page*>::const_iterator it = d->m_pagesVector.constBegin(), end = d->m_pagesVector.constEnd();
2539  for ( ; it != end; ++it ) {
2540  (*it)->deletePixmaps();
2541  }
2542 
2543  // [MEM] remove allocation descriptors
2544  qDeleteAll( d->m_allocatedPixmaps );
2545  d->m_allocatedPixmaps.clear();
2546  d->m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory = 0;
2547 
2548  // send reload signals to observers
2549  foreachObserver( notifyContentsCleared( DocumentObserver::Pixmap ) );
2550  }
2551 
2552  // free memory if in 'low' profile
2553  if ( SettingsCore::memoryLevel() == SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Low &&
2554  !d->m_allocatedPixmaps.isEmpty() && !d->m_pagesVector.isEmpty() )
2555  d->cleanupPixmapMemory();
2556 }

2609  DocumentInfo::getKeyTitle( keyPages ) );

2623 void Document::startFontReading()
2624 {
2625  if ( !d->m_generator || !d->m_generator->hasFeature( Generator::FontInfo ) || d->m_fontThread )
2626  return;
2627 
2628  if ( d->m_fontsCached )
2629  {
2630  // in case we have cached fonts, simulate a reading
2631  // this way the API is the same, and users no need to care about the
2632  // internal caching
2633  for ( int i = 0; i < d->m_fontsCache.count(); ++i )
2634  {
2635  emit gotFont( d->m_fontsCache.at( i ) );
2636  emit fontReadingProgress( i / pages() );
2637  }
2638  emit fontReadingEnded();
2639  return;
2640  }
2641 
2642  d->m_fontThread = new FontExtractionThread( d->m_generator, pages() );
2643  connect( d->m_fontThread, SIGNAL(gotFont(Okular::FontInfo)), this, SLOT(fontReadingGotFont(Okular::FontInfo)) );
2644  connect( d->m_fontThread, SIGNAL(progress(int)), this, SLOT(fontReadingProgress(int)) );
2645 
2646  d->m_fontThread->startExtraction( /*d->m_generator->hasFeature( Generator::Threaded )*/true );
2647 }
2648 
2649 void Document::stopFontReading()
2650 {
2651  if ( !d->m_fontThread )
2652  return;
2653 
2654  disconnect( d->m_fontThread, 0, this, 0 );
2655  d->m_fontThread->stopExtraction();
2656  d->m_fontThread = 0;
2657  d->m_fontsCache.clear();
2658 }

2807 QSizeF Document::allPagesSize() const
2808 {
2809  bool allPagesSameSize = true;
2810  QSizeF size;
2811  for (int i = 0; allPagesSameSize && i < d->m_pagesVector.count(); ++i)
2812  {
2813  const Page *p = d->m_pagesVector.at(i);
2814  if (i == 0) size = QSizeF(p->width(), p->height());
2815  else
2816  {
2817  allPagesSameSize = (size == QSizeF(p->width(), p->height()));
2818  }
2819  }
2820  if (allPagesSameSize) return size;
2821  else return QSizeF();
2822 }

2837 void Document::requestPixmaps( const QLinkedList< PixmapRequest * > & requests )
2838 {
2839  requestPixmaps( requests, RemoveAllPrevious );
2840 }
2841 
2842 void Document::requestPixmaps( const QLinkedList< PixmapRequest * > & requests, PixmapRequestFlags reqOptions )
2843 {
2844  if ( requests.isEmpty() )
2845  return;
2846 
2847  if ( !d->m_generator || d->m_closingLoop )
2848  {
2849  // delete requests..
2850  QLinkedList< PixmapRequest * >::const_iterator rIt = requests.constBegin(), rEnd = requests.constEnd();
2851  for ( ; rIt != rEnd; ++rIt )
2852  delete *rIt;
2853  // ..and return
2854  return;
2855  }
2856 
2857  // 1. [CLEAN STACK] remove previous requests of requesterID
2858  // FIXME This assumes all requests come from the same observer, that is true atm but not enforced anywhere
2859  DocumentObserver *requesterObserver = requests.first()->observer();
2860  QSet< int > requestedPages;
2861  {
2862  QLinkedList< PixmapRequest * >::const_iterator rIt = requests.constBegin(), rEnd = requests.constEnd();
2863  for ( ; rIt != rEnd; ++rIt )
2864  requestedPages.insert( (*rIt)->pageNumber() );
2865  }
2866  const bool removeAllPrevious = reqOptions & RemoveAllPrevious;
2867  d->m_pixmapRequestsMutex.lock();
2868  QLinkedList< PixmapRequest * >::iterator sIt = d->m_pixmapRequestsStack.begin(), sEnd = d->m_pixmapRequestsStack.end();
2869  while ( sIt != sEnd )
2870  {
2871  if ( (*sIt)->observer() == requesterObserver
2872  && ( removeAllPrevious || requestedPages.contains( (*sIt)->pageNumber() ) ) )
2873  {
2874  // delete request and remove it from stack
2875  delete *sIt;
2876  sIt = d->m_pixmapRequestsStack.erase( sIt );
2877  }
2878  else
2879  ++sIt;
2880  }
2881 
2882  // 2. [ADD TO STACK] add requests to stack
2883  QLinkedList< PixmapRequest * >::const_iterator rIt = requests.constBegin(), rEnd = requests.constEnd();
2884  for ( ; rIt != rEnd; ++rIt )
2885  {
2886  // set the 'page field' (see PixmapRequest) and check if it is valid
2887  PixmapRequest * request = *rIt;
2888  kDebug(OkularDebug).nospace() << "request observer=" << request->observer() << " " <<request->width() << "x" << request->height() << "@" << request->pageNumber();
2889  if ( d->m_pagesVector.value( request->pageNumber() ) == 0 )
2890  {
2891  // skip requests referencing an invalid page (must not happen)
2892  delete request;
2893  continue;
2894  }
2895 
2896  request->d->mPage = d->m_pagesVector.value( request->pageNumber() );
2897 
2898  if ( request->isTile() )
2899  {
2900  // Change the current request rect so that only invalid tiles are
2901  // requested. Also make sure the rect is tile-aligned.
2902  NormalizedRect tilesRect;
2903  const QList<Tile> tiles = request->d->tilesManager()->tilesAt( request->normalizedRect(), TilesManager::TerminalTile );
2904  QList<Tile>::const_iterator tIt = tiles.constBegin(), tEnd = tiles.constEnd();
2905  while ( tIt != tEnd )
2906  {
2907  const Tile &tile = *tIt;
2908  if ( !tile.isValid() )
2909  {
2910  if ( tilesRect.isNull() )
2911  tilesRect = tile.rect();
2912  else
2913  tilesRect |= tile.rect();
2914  }
2915 
2916  tIt++;
2917  }
2918 
2919  request->setNormalizedRect( tilesRect );
2920  }
2921 
2922  if ( !request->asynchronous() )
2923  request->d->mPriority = 0;
2924 
2925  // add request to the 'stack' at the right place
2926  if ( !request->priority() )
2927  // add priority zero requests to the top of the stack
2928  d->m_pixmapRequestsStack.append( request );
2929  else
2930  {
2931  // insert in stack sorted by priority
2932  sIt = d->m_pixmapRequestsStack.begin();
2933  sEnd = d->m_pixmapRequestsStack.end();
2934  while ( sIt != sEnd && (*sIt)->priority() > request->priority() )
2935  ++sIt;
2936  d->m_pixmapRequestsStack.insert( sIt, request );
2937  }
2938  }
2939  d->m_pixmapRequestsMutex.unlock();
2940 
2941  // 3. [START FIRST GENERATION] if <NO>generator is ready, start a new generation,
2942  // or else (if gen is running) it will be started when the new contents will
2943  //come from generator (in requestDone())</NO>
2944  // all handling of requests put into sendGeneratorPixmapRequest
2945  // if ( generator->canRequestPixmap() )
2946  d->sendGeneratorPixmapRequest();
2947 }

2980 bool Document::canModifyPageAnnotation( const Annotation * annotation ) const
2981 {
2982  if ( !annotation || ( annotation->flags() & Annotation::DenyWrite ) )
2983  return false;
2984 
2985  if ( !isAllowed(Okular::AllowNotes) )
2986  return false;
2987 
2988  if ( ( annotation->flags() & Annotation::External ) && !d->canModifyExternalAnnotations() )
2989  return false;
2990 
2991  switch ( annotation->subType() )
2992  {
2993  case Annotation::AText:
2994  case Annotation::ALine:
2995  case Annotation::AGeom:
2996  case Annotation::AHighlight:
2997  case Annotation::AStamp:
2998  case Annotation::AInk:
2999  return true;
3000  default:
3001  return false;
3002  }
3003 }

3076 void Document::removePageAnnotation( int page, Annotation * annotation )
3077 {

3167 void Document::setViewportPage( int page, DocumentObserver *excludeObserver, bool smoothMove )
3168 {
3169  // clamp page in range [0 ... numPages-1]
3170  if ( page < 0 )
3171  page = 0;
3172  else if ( page > (int)d->m_pagesVector.count() )
3173  page = d->m_pagesVector.count() - 1;
3174 
3175  // make a viewport from the page and broadcast it
3176  setViewport( DocumentViewport( page ), excludeObserver, smoothMove );
3177 }
3178 
3179 void Document::setViewport( const DocumentViewport & viewport, DocumentObserver *excludeObserver, bool smoothMove )
3180 {
3181  if ( !viewport.isValid() )
3182  {
3183  kDebug(OkularDebug) << "invalid viewport:" << viewport.toString();
3184  return;
3185  }
3186  if ( viewport.pageNumber >= int(d->m_pagesVector.count()) )
3187  {
3188  //kDebug(OkularDebug) << "viewport out of document:" << viewport.toString();
3189  return;
3190  }
3191 
3192  // if already broadcasted, don't redo it
3193  DocumentViewport & oldViewport = *d->m_viewportIterator;
3194  // disabled by enrico on 2005-03-18 (less debug output)
3195  //if ( viewport == oldViewport )
3196  // kDebug(OkularDebug) << "setViewport with the same viewport.";
3197 
3198  const int oldPageNumber = oldViewport.pageNumber;
3199 
3200  // set internal viewport taking care of history
3201  if ( oldViewport.pageNumber == viewport.pageNumber || !oldViewport.isValid() )
3202  {
3203  // if page is unchanged save the viewport at current position in queue
3204  oldViewport = viewport;
3205  }
3206  else
3207  {
3208  // remove elements after viewportIterator in queue
3209  d->m_viewportHistory.erase( ++d->m_viewportIterator, d->m_viewportHistory.end() );
3210 
3211  // keep the list to a reasonable size by removing head when needed
3212  if ( d->m_viewportHistory.count() >= OKULAR_HISTORY_MAXSTEPS )
3213  d->m_viewportHistory.pop_front();
3214 
3215  // add the item at the end of the queue
3216  d->m_viewportIterator = d->m_viewportHistory.insert( d->m_viewportHistory.end(), viewport );
3217  }
3218 
3219  const int currentViewportPage = (*d->m_viewportIterator).pageNumber;
3220 
3221  const bool currentPageChanged = (oldPageNumber != currentViewportPage);
3222 
3223  // notify change to all other (different from id) observers
3224  foreach(DocumentObserver *o, d->m_observers)
3225  {
3226  if ( o != excludeObserver )
3227  o->notifyViewportChanged( smoothMove );
3228 
3229  if ( currentPageChanged )
3230  o->notifyCurrentPageChanged( oldPageNumber, currentViewportPage );
3231  }
3232 }

3242 void Document::setPrevViewport()
3243 // restore viewport from the history
3244 {
3245  if ( d->m_viewportIterator != d->m_viewportHistory.begin() )
3246  {
3247  const int oldViewportPage = (*d->m_viewportIterator).pageNumber;
3248 
3249  // restore previous viewport and notify it to observers
3250  --d->m_viewportIterator;
3251  foreachObserver( notifyViewportChanged( true ) );
3252 
3253  const int currentViewportPage = (*d->m_viewportIterator).pageNumber;
3254  if (oldViewportPage != currentViewportPage)
3255  foreachObserver( notifyCurrentPageChanged( oldViewportPage, currentViewportPage ) );
3256  }
3257 }

3259 void Document::setNextViewport()
3260 // restore next viewport from the history
3261 {
3262  QLinkedList< DocumentViewport >::const_iterator nextIterator = d->m_viewportIterator;
3263  ++nextIterator;
3264  if ( nextIterator != d->m_viewportHistory.end() )
3265  {
3266  const int oldViewportPage = (*d->m_viewportIterator).pageNumber;
3267 
3268  // restore next viewport and notify it to observers
3269  ++d->m_viewportIterator;
3270  foreachObserver( notifyViewportChanged( true ) );
3271 
3272  const int currentViewportPage = (*d->m_viewportIterator).pageNumber;
3273  if (oldViewportPage != currentViewportPage)
3274  foreachObserver( notifyCurrentPageChanged( oldViewportPage, currentViewportPage ) );
3275  }

3288 void Document::searchText( int searchID, const QString & text, bool fromStart, Qt::CaseSensitivity caseSensitivity,
3289  SearchType type, bool moveViewport, const QColor & color, bool noDialogs )
3290 {
3291  d->m_searchCancelled = false;
3292 
3293  // safety checks: don't perform searches on empty or unsearchable docs
3294  if ( !d->m_generator || !d->m_generator->hasFeature( Generator::TextExtraction ) || d->m_pagesVector.isEmpty() )
3295  {
3296  emit searchFinished( searchID, NoMatchFound );
3297  return;
3298  }
3299 
3300  if ( !noDialogs )
3301  {
3302 #if 0
3303  KDialog *searchDialog = new KDialog(widget());
3304  searchDialog->setCaption( i18n("Search in progress...") );
3305  searchDialog->setButtons( KDialog::Cancel );
3306  QLabel *searchLabel = new QLabel(i18n("Searching for %1", text), searchDialog);
3307  searchDialog->setMainWidget( searchLabel );
3308 
3309  QTimer::singleShot(500, searchDialog, SLOT(show()));
3310  connect(this, SIGNAL(searchFinished(int,Okular::Document::SearchStatus)), searchDialog, SLOT(deleteLater()));
3311  connect(searchDialog, SIGNAL(finished()), this, SLOT(cancelSearch()));
3312 #endif
3313  }
3314 
3315  // if searchID search not recorded, create new descriptor and init params
3316  QMap< int, RunningSearch * >::iterator searchIt = d->m_searches.find( searchID );
3317  if ( searchIt == d->m_searches.end() )
3318  {
3319  RunningSearch * search = new RunningSearch();
3320  search->continueOnPage = -1;
3321  searchIt = d->m_searches.insert( searchID, search );
3322  }
3323  if (d->m_lastSearchID != searchID)
3324  {
3325  resetSearch(d->m_lastSearchID);
3326  }
3327  d->m_lastSearchID = searchID;
3328  RunningSearch * s = *searchIt;
3329 
3330  // update search structure
3331  bool newText = text != s->cachedString;
3332  s->cachedString = text;
3333  s->cachedType = type;
3334  s->cachedCaseSensitivity = caseSensitivity;
3335  s->cachedViewportMove = moveViewport;
3336  s->cachedNoDialogs = noDialogs;
3337  s->cachedColor = color;
3338  s->isCurrentlySearching = true;
3339 
3340  // global data for search
3341  QSet< int > *pagesToNotify = new QSet< int >;
3342 
3343  // remove highlights from pages and queue them for notifying changes
3344  *pagesToNotify += s->highlightedPages;
3345  foreach(int pageNumber, s->highlightedPages)
3346  d->m_pagesVector.at(pageNumber)->d->deleteHighlights( searchID );
3347  s->highlightedPages.clear();
3348 
3349  // set hourglass cursor
3350  QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
3351 
3352  // 1. ALLDOC - proces all document marking pages
3353  if ( type == AllDocument )
3354  {
3355  QMap< Page *, QVector<RegularAreaRect *> > *pageMatches = new QMap< Page *, QVector<RegularAreaRect *> >;
3356 
3357  // search and highlight 'text' (as a solid phrase) on all pages
3358  QMetaObject::invokeMethod(this, "doContinueAllDocumentSearch", Qt::QueuedConnection, Q_ARG(void *, pagesToNotify), Q_ARG(void *, pageMatches), Q_ARG(int, 0), Q_ARG(int, searchID), Q_ARG(QString, text), Q_ARG(int, caseSensitivity), Q_ARG(QColor, color));
3359  }
3360  // 2. NEXTMATCH - find next matching item (or start from top)
3361  // 3. PREVMATCH - find previous matching item (or start from bottom)
3362  else if ( type == NextMatch || type == PreviousMatch )
3363  {
3364  // find out from where to start/resume search from
3365  const bool forward = type == NextMatch;
3366  const int viewportPage = (*d->m_viewportIterator).pageNumber;
3367  const int fromStartSearchPage = forward ? 0 : d->m_pagesVector.count() - 1;
3368  int currentPage = fromStart ? fromStartSearchPage : ((s->continueOnPage != -1) ? s->continueOnPage : viewportPage);
3369  Page * lastPage = fromStart ? 0 : d->m_pagesVector[ currentPage ];
3370  int pagesDone = 0;
3371 
3372  // continue checking last TextPage first (if it is the current page)
3373  RegularAreaRect * match = 0;
3374  if ( lastPage && lastPage->number() == s->continueOnPage )
3375  {
3376  if ( newText )
3377  match = lastPage->findText( searchID, text, forward ? FromTop : FromBottom, caseSensitivity );
3378  else
3379  match = lastPage->findText( searchID, text, forward ? NextResult : PreviousResult, caseSensitivity, &s->continueOnMatch );
3380  if ( !match )
3381  {
3382  if (forward) currentPage++;
3383  else currentPage--;
3384  pagesDone++;
3385  }
3386  }
3387 
3388  DoContinueDirectionMatchSearchStruct *searchStruct = new DoContinueDirectionMatchSearchStruct();
3389  searchStruct->forward = forward;
3390  searchStruct->pagesToNotify = pagesToNotify;
3391  searchStruct->match = match;
3392  searchStruct->currentPage = currentPage;
3393  searchStruct->searchID = searchID;
3394  searchStruct->text = text;
3395  searchStruct->caseSensitivity = caseSensitivity;
3396  searchStruct->moveViewport = moveViewport;
3397  searchStruct->color = color;
3398  searchStruct->noDialogs = noDialogs;
3399  searchStruct->pagesDone = pagesDone;
3400 
3401  QMetaObject::invokeMethod(this, "doContinueDirectionMatchSearch", Qt::QueuedConnection, Q_ARG(void *, searchStruct));
3402  }
3403  // 4. GOOGLE* - process all document marking pages
3404  else if ( type == GoogleAll || type == GoogleAny )
3405  {
3406  bool matchAll = type == GoogleAll;
3407 
3408  QMap< Page *, QVector< QPair<RegularAreaRect *, QColor> > > *pageMatches = new QMap< Page *, QVector<QPair<RegularAreaRect *, QColor> > >;
3409  const QStringList words = text.split( ' ', QString::SkipEmptyParts );
3410 
3411  // search and highlight every word in 'text' on all pages
3412  QMetaObject::invokeMethod(this, "doContinueGooglesDocumentSearch", Qt::QueuedConnection, Q_ARG(void *, pagesToNotify), Q_ARG(void *, pageMatches), Q_ARG(int, 0), Q_ARG(int, searchID), Q_ARG(QStringList, words), Q_ARG(int, caseSensitivity), Q_ARG(QColor, color), Q_ARG(bool, matchAll));
3413  }
3414 }

3416 void Document::continueSearch( int searchID )
3417 {
3418  // check if searchID is present in runningSearches
3419  QMap< int, RunningSearch * >::const_iterator it = d->m_searches.constFind( searchID );
3420  if ( it == d->m_searches.constEnd() )
3421  {
3422  emit searchFinished( searchID, NoMatchFound );
3423  return;
3424  }
3425 
3426  // start search with cached parameters from last search by searchID
3427  RunningSearch * p = *it;
3428  if ( !p->isCurrentlySearching )
3429  searchText( searchID, p->cachedString, false, p->cachedCaseSensitivity,
3430  p->cachedType, p->cachedViewportMove, p->cachedColor,
3431  p->cachedNoDialogs );
3432 }

3452 void Document::resetSearch( int searchID )
3453 {
3454  // if we are closing down, don't bother doing anything
3455  if ( !d->m_generator )
3456  return;
3457 
3458  // check if searchID is present in runningSearches
3459  QMap< int, RunningSearch * >::iterator searchIt = d->m_searches.find( searchID );
3460  if ( searchIt == d->m_searches.end() )
3461  return;
3462 
3463  // get previous parameters for search
3464  RunningSearch * s = *searchIt;
3465 
3466  // unhighlight pages and inform observers about that
3467  foreach(int pageNumber, s->highlightedPages)
3468  {
3469  d->m_pagesVector.at(pageNumber)->d->deleteHighlights( searchID );
3470  foreachObserver( notifyPageChanged( pageNumber, DocumentObserver::Highlights ) );
3471  }
3472 
3473  // send the setup signal too (to update views that filter on matches)
3474  foreachObserver( notifySetup( d->m_pagesVector, 0 ) );
3475 
3476  // remove serch from the runningSearches list and delete it
3477  d->m_searches.erase( searchIt );
3478  delete s;
3479 }

3565 QString Document::bookmarkedPageRange() const
3566 {
3567  // Code formerly in Part::slotPrint()
3568  // range detecting
3569  QString range;
3570  uint docPages = pages();
3571  int startId = -1;
3572  int endId = -1;
3573 
3574  for ( uint i = 0; i < docPages; ++i )
3575  {
3576  if ( bookmarkManager()->isBookmarked( i ) )
3577  {
3578  if ( startId < 0 )
3579  startId = i;
3580  if ( endId < 0 )
3581  endId = startId;
3582  else
3583  ++endId;
3584  }
3585  else if ( startId >= 0 && endId >= 0 )
3586  {
3587  if ( !range.isEmpty() )
3588  range += ',';
3589 
3590  if ( endId - startId > 0 )
3591  range += QString( "%1-%2" ).arg( startId + 1 ).arg( endId + 1 );
3592  else
3593  range += QString::number( startId + 1 );
3594  startId = -1;
3595  endId = -1;
3596  }
3597  }
3598  if ( startId >= 0 && endId >= 0 )
3599  {
3600  if ( !range.isEmpty() )
3601  range += ',';
3602 
3603  if ( endId - startId > 0 )
3604  range += QString( "%1-%2" ).arg( startId + 1 ).arg( endId + 1 );
3605  else
3606  range += QString::number( startId + 1 );
3607  }
3608  return range;
3609 }
3610 
3611 void Document::processAction( const Action * action )
3612 {
3613  if ( !action )
3614  return;
3615 
3616  switch( action->actionType() )
3617  {
3618  case Action::Goto: {
3619  const GotoAction * go = static_cast< const GotoAction * >( action );
3620  d->m_nextDocumentViewport = go->destViewport();
3621  d->m_nextDocumentDestination = go->destinationName();
3622 
3623  // Explanation of why d->m_nextDocumentViewport is needed:
3624  // all openRelativeFile does is launch a signal telling we
3625  // want to open another URL, the problem is that when the file is
3626  // non local, the loading is done assynchronously so you can't
3627  // do a setViewport after the if as it was because you are doing the setViewport
3628  // on the old file and when the new arrives there is no setViewport for it and
3629  // it does not show anything
3630 
3631  // first open filename if link is pointing outside this document
3632  if ( go->isExternal() && !d->openRelativeFile( go->fileName() ) )
3633  {
3634  kWarning(OkularDebug).nospace() << "Action: Error opening '" << go->fileName() << "'.";
3635  return;
3636  }
3637  else
3638  {
3639  const DocumentViewport nextViewport = d->nextDocumentViewport();
3640  // skip local links that point to nowhere (broken ones)
3641  if ( !nextViewport.isValid() )
3642  return;
3643 
3644  setViewport( nextViewport, 0, true );
3645  d->m_nextDocumentViewport = DocumentViewport();
3646  d->m_nextDocumentDestination = QString();
3647  }
3648 
3649  } break;
3650 
3651  case Action::Execute: {
3652  const ExecuteAction * exe = static_cast< const ExecuteAction * >( action );
3653  QString fileName = exe->fileName();
3654  if ( fileName.endsWith( ".pdf" ) || fileName.endsWith( ".PDF" ) )
3655  {
3656  d->openRelativeFile( fileName );
3657  return;
3658  }
3659 
3660  // Albert: the only pdf i have that has that kind of link don't define
3661  // an application and use the fileName as the file to open
3662  fileName = d->giveAbsolutePath( fileName );
3663  KMimeType::Ptr mime = KMimeType::findByPath( fileName );
3664  // Check executables
3665  if ( KRun::isExecutableFile( fileName, mime->name() ) )
3666  {
3667  // Don't have any pdf that uses this code path, just a guess on how it should work
3668  if ( !exe->parameters().isEmpty() )
3669  {
3670  fileName = d->giveAbsolutePath( exe->parameters() );
3671  mime = KMimeType::findByPath( fileName );
3672  if ( KRun::isExecutableFile( fileName, mime->name() ) )
3673  {
3674  // this case is a link pointing to an executable with a parameter
3675  // that also is an executable, possibly a hand-crafted pdf
3676  KMessageBox::information( widget(), i18n("The document is trying to execute an external application and, for your safety, Okular does not allow that.") );
3677  return;
3678  }
3679  }
3680  else
3681  {
3682  // this case is a link pointing to an executable with no parameters
3683  // core developers find unacceptable executing it even after asking the user
3684  KMessageBox::information( widget(), i18n("The document is trying to execute an external application and, for your safety, Okular does not allow that.") );
3685  return;
3686  }
3687  }
3688 
3689  KService::Ptr ptr = KMimeTypeTrader::self()->preferredService( mime->name(), "Application" );
3690  if ( ptr )
3691  {
3692  KUrl::List lst;
3693  lst.append( fileName );
3694  KRun::run( *ptr, lst, 0 );
3695  }
3696  else
3697  KMessageBox::information( widget(), i18n( "No application found for opening file of mimetype %1.", mime->name() ) );
3698  } break;
3699 
3700  case Action::DocAction: {
3701  const DocumentAction * docaction = static_cast< const DocumentAction * >( action );
3702  switch( docaction->documentActionType() )
3703  {
3704  case DocumentAction::PageFirst:
3705  setViewportPage( 0 );
3706  break;
3707  case DocumentAction::PagePrev:
3708  if ( (*d->m_viewportIterator).pageNumber > 0 )
3709  setViewportPage( (*d->m_viewportIterator).pageNumber - 1 );
3710  break;
3711  case DocumentAction::PageNext:
3712  if ( (*d->m_viewportIterator).pageNumber < (int)d->m_pagesVector.count() - 1 )
3713  setViewportPage( (*d->m_viewportIterator).pageNumber + 1 );
3714  break;
3715  case DocumentAction::PageLast:
3716  setViewportPage( d->m_pagesVector.count() - 1 );
3717  break;
3718  case DocumentAction::HistoryBack:
3719  setPrevViewport();
3720  break;
3721  case DocumentAction::HistoryForward:
3722  setNextViewport();
3723  break;
3724  case DocumentAction::Quit:
3725  emit quit();
3726  break;
3727  case DocumentAction::Presentation:
3728  emit linkPresentation();
3729  break;
3730  case DocumentAction::EndPresentation:
3731  emit linkEndPresentation();
3732  break;
3733  case DocumentAction::Find:
3734  emit linkFind();
3735  break;
3736  case DocumentAction::GoToPage:
3737  emit linkGoToPage();
3738  break;
3739  case DocumentAction::Close:
3740  emit close();
3741  break;
3742  }
3743  } break;
3744 
3745  case Action::Browse: {
3746  const BrowseAction * browse = static_cast< const BrowseAction * >( action );
3747  QString lilySource;
3748  int lilyRow = 0, lilyCol = 0;
3749  // if the url is a mailto one, invoke mailer
3750  if ( browse->url().startsWith( "mailto:", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) )
3751  KToolInvocation::invokeMailer( browse->url() );
3752  else if ( extractLilyPondSourceReference( browse->url(), &lilySource, &lilyRow, &lilyCol ) )
3753  {
3754  const SourceReference ref( lilySource, lilyRow, lilyCol );
3755  processSourceReference( &ref );
3756  }
3757  else
3758  {
3759  QString url = browse->url();
3760 
3761  // fix for #100366, documents with relative links that are the form of http:foo.pdf
3762  if (url.indexOf("http:") == 0 && url.indexOf("http://") == -1 && url.right(4) == ".pdf")
3763  {
3764  d->openRelativeFile(url.mid(5));
3765  return;
3766  }
3767 
3768  KUrl realUrl = KUrl( url );
3769 
3770  // handle documents with relative path
3771  if ( d->m_url.isValid() )
3772  {
3773  realUrl = KUrl( d->m_url.upUrl(), url );
3774  }
3775 
3776  // Albert: this is not a leak!
3777  new KRun( realUrl, widget() );
3778  }
3779  } break;
3780 
3781  case Action::Sound: {
3782  const SoundAction * linksound = static_cast< const SoundAction * >( action );
3783  AudioPlayer::instance()->playSound( linksound->sound(), linksound );
3784  } break;
3785 
3786  case Action::Script: {
3787  const ScriptAction * linkscript = static_cast< const ScriptAction * >( action );
3788  if ( !d->m_scripter )
3789  d->m_scripter = new Scripter( d );
3790  d->m_scripter->execute( linkscript->scriptType(), linkscript->script() );
3791  } break;
3792 
3793  case Action::Movie:
3794  emit processMovieAction( static_cast< const MovieAction * >( action ) );
3795  break;
3796  case Action::Rendition: {
3797  const RenditionAction * linkrendition = static_cast< const RenditionAction * >( action );
3798  if ( !linkrendition->script().isEmpty() )
3799  {
3800  if ( !d->m_scripter )
3801  d->m_scripter = new Scripter( d );
3802  d->m_scripter->execute( linkrendition->scriptType(), linkrendition->script() );
3803  }
3804  else
3805  {
3806  emit processRenditionAction( static_cast< const RenditionAction * >( action ) );
3807  }
3808  } break;
3809  }
3810 }
3811 
3812 void Document::processSourceReference( const SourceReference * ref )
3813 {
3814  if ( !ref )
3815  return;
3816 
3817  const KUrl url( d->giveAbsolutePath( ref->fileName() ) );
3818  if ( !url.isLocalFile() )
3819  {
3820  kDebug(OkularDebug) << url.url() << "is not a local file.";
3821  return;
3822  }
3823 
3824  const QString absFileName = url.toLocalFile();
3825  if ( !QFile::exists( absFileName ) )
3826  {
3827  kDebug(OkularDebug) << "No such file:" << absFileName;
3828  return;
3829  }
3830 
3831  bool handled = false;
3832  emit sourceReferenceActivated(absFileName, ref->row(), ref->column(), &handled);
3833  if(handled) {
3834  return;
3835  }
3836 
3837  static QHash< int, QString > editors;
3838  // init the editors table if empty (on first run, usually)
3839  if ( editors.isEmpty() )
3840  {
3841  editors = buildEditorsMap();
3842  }
3843 
3844  QHash< int, QString >::const_iterator it = editors.constFind( SettingsCore::externalEditor() );
3845  QString p;
3846  if ( it != editors.constEnd() )
3847  p = *it;
3848  else
3849  p = SettingsCore::externalEditorCommand();
3850  // custom editor not yet configured
3851  if ( p.isEmpty() )
3852  return;
3853 
3854  // manually append the %f placeholder if not specified
3855  if ( p.indexOf( QLatin1String( "%f" ) ) == -1 )
3856  p.append( QLatin1String( " %f" ) );
3857 
3858  // replacing the placeholders
3859  QHash< QChar, QString > map;
3860  map.insert( 'f', absFileName );
3861  map.insert( 'c', QString::number( ref->column() ) );
3862  map.insert( 'l', QString::number( ref->row() ) );
3863  const QString cmd = KMacroExpander::expandMacrosShellQuote( p, map );
3864  if ( cmd.isEmpty() )
3865  return;
3866  const QStringList args = KShell::splitArgs( cmd );
3867  if ( args.isEmpty() )
3868  return;
3869 
3870  KProcess::startDetached( args );
3871 }

3879  }
3880  return ref;

3915 QString Document::printError() const
3916 {
3917  Okular::Generator::PrintError err = Generator::UnknownPrintError;
3918  if ( d->m_generator )
3919  {
3920  QMetaObject::invokeMethod( d->m_generator, "printError", Qt::DirectConnection, Q_RETURN_ARG(Okular::Generator::PrintError, err) );
3921  }
3922  Q_ASSERT( err != Generator::NoPrintError );
3923  switch ( err )
3924  {
3925  case Generator::TemporaryFileOpenPrintError:
3926  return i18n( "Could not open a temporary file" );
3927  case Generator::FileConversionPrintError:
3928  return i18n( "Print conversion failed" );
3929  case Generator::PrintingProcessCrashPrintError:
3930  return i18n( "Printing process crashed" );
3931  case Generator::PrintingProcessStartPrintError:
3932  return i18n( "Printing process could not start" );
3933  case Generator::PrintToFilePrintError:
3934  return i18n( "Printing to file failed" );
3935  case Generator::InvalidPrinterStatePrintError:
3936  return i18n( "Printer was in invalid state" );
3937  case Generator::UnableToFindFilePrintError:
3938  return i18n( "Unable to find file to print" );
3939  case Generator::NoFileToPrintError:
3940  return i18n( "There was no file to print" );
3941  case Generator::NoBinaryToPrintError:
3942  return i18n( "Could not find a suitable binary for printing. Make sure CUPS lpr binary is available" );
3943  case Generator::InvalidPageSizePrintError:
3944  return i18n( "The page print size is invalid" );
3945  case Generator::NoPrintError:
3946  return QString();
3947  case Generator::UnknownPrintError:
3948  return QString();
3949  }
3950 
3951  return QString();
3952 }

4137 bool Document::openDocumentArchive( const QString & docFile, const KUrl & url )
4138 {
4139  const KMimeType::Ptr mime = KMimeType::findByPath( docFile, 0, false /* content too */ );
4140  if ( !mime->is( "application/vnd.kde.okular-archive" ) )
4141  return false;
4142 
4143  KZip okularArchive( docFile );
4144  if ( !okularArchive.open( QIODevice::ReadOnly ) )
4145  return false;
4146 
4147  const KArchiveDirectory * mainDir = okularArchive.directory();
4148  const KArchiveEntry * mainEntry = mainDir->entry( "content.xml" );
4149  if ( !mainEntry || !mainEntry->isFile() )
4150  return false;
4151 
4152  std::auto_ptr< QIODevice > mainEntryDevice( static_cast< const KZipFileEntry * >( mainEntry )->createDevice() );
4153  QDomDocument doc;
4154  if ( !doc.setContent( mainEntryDevice.get() ) )
4155  return false;
4156  mainEntryDevice.reset();
4157 
4158  QDomElement root = doc.documentElement();
4159  if ( root.tagName() != "OkularArchive" )
4160  return false;
4161 
4162  QString documentFileName;
4163  QString metadataFileName;
4164  QDomElement el = root.firstChild().toElement();
4165  for ( ; !el.isNull(); el = el.nextSibling().toElement() )
4166  {
4167  if ( el.tagName() == "Files" )
4168  {
4169  QDomElement fileEl = el.firstChild().toElement();
4170  for ( ; !fileEl.isNull(); fileEl = fileEl.nextSibling().toElement() )
4171  {
4172  if ( fileEl.tagName() == "DocumentFileName" )
4173  documentFileName = fileEl.text();
4174  else if ( fileEl.tagName() == "MetadataFileName" )
4175  metadataFileName = fileEl.text();
4176  }
4177  }
4178  }
4179  if ( documentFileName.isEmpty() )
4180  return false;
4181 
4182  const KArchiveEntry * docEntry = mainDir->entry( documentFileName );
4183  if ( !docEntry || !docEntry->isFile() )
4184  return false;
4185 
4186  std::auto_ptr< ArchiveData > archiveData( new ArchiveData() );
4187  const int dotPos = documentFileName.indexOf( '.' );
4188  if ( dotPos != -1 )
4189  archiveData->document.setSuffix( documentFileName.mid( dotPos ) );
4190  if ( !archiveData->document.open() )
4191  return false;
4192 
4193  QString tempFileName = archiveData->document.fileName();
4194  {
4195  std::auto_ptr< QIODevice > docEntryDevice( static_cast< const KZipFileEntry * >( docEntry )->createDevice() );
4196  copyQIODevice( docEntryDevice.get(), &archiveData->document );
4197  archiveData->document.close();
4198  }
4199 
4200  std::auto_ptr< KTemporaryFile > tempMetadataFileName;
4201  const KArchiveEntry * metadataEntry = mainDir->entry( metadataFileName );
4202  if ( metadataEntry && metadataEntry->isFile() )
4203  {
4204  std::auto_ptr< QIODevice > metadataEntryDevice( static_cast< const KZipFileEntry * >( metadataEntry )->createDevice() );
4205  tempMetadataFileName.reset( new KTemporaryFile() );
4206  tempMetadataFileName->setSuffix( ".xml" );
4207  tempMetadataFileName->setAutoRemove( false );
4208  if ( tempMetadataFileName->open() )
4209  {
4210  copyQIODevice( metadataEntryDevice.get(), tempMetadataFileName.get() );
4211  archiveData->metadataFileName = tempMetadataFileName->fileName();
4212  tempMetadataFileName->close();
4213  }
4214  }
4215 
4216  const KMimeType::Ptr docMime = KMimeType::findByPath( tempFileName, 0, true /* local file */ );
4217  d->m_archiveData = archiveData.get();
4218  d->m_archivedFileName = documentFileName;
4219  bool ret = openDocument( tempFileName, url, docMime );
4220 
4221  if ( ret )
4222  {
4223  archiveData.release();
4224  }
4225  else
4226  {
4227  d->m_archiveData = 0;
4228  }
4229 
4230  return ret;
4231 }
4232 
4233 bool Document::saveDocumentArchive( const QString &fileName )
4234 {
4235  if ( !d->m_generator )
4236  return false;
4237 
4238  /* If we opened an archive, use the name of original file (eg foo.pdf)
4239  * instead of the archive's one (eg foo.okular) */
4240  QString docFileName = d->m_archiveData ? d->m_archivedFileName : d->m_url.fileName();
4241  if ( docFileName == QLatin1String( "-" ) )
4242  return false;
4243 
4244  QString docPath = d->m_docFileName;
4245  const QFileInfo fi( docPath );
4246  if ( fi.isSymLink() )
4247  docPath = fi.symLinkTarget();
4248 
4249  KZip okularArchive( fileName );
4250  if ( !okularArchive.open( QIODevice::WriteOnly ) )
4251  return false;
4252 
4253  const KUser user;
4254 #ifndef Q_OS_WIN
4255  const KUserGroup userGroup( user.gid() );
4256 #else
4257  const KUserGroup userGroup( QString( "" ) );
4258 #endif
4259 
4260  QDomDocument contentDoc( "OkularArchive" );
4261  QDomProcessingInstruction xmlPi = contentDoc.createProcessingInstruction(
4262  QString::fromLatin1( "xml" ), QString::fromLatin1( "version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"" ) );
4263  contentDoc.appendChild( xmlPi );
4264  QDomElement root = contentDoc.createElement( "OkularArchive" );
4265  contentDoc.appendChild( root );
4266 
4267  QDomElement filesNode = contentDoc.createElement( "Files" );
4268  root.appendChild( filesNode );
4269 
4270  QDomElement fileNameNode = contentDoc.createElement( "DocumentFileName" );
4271  filesNode.appendChild( fileNameNode );
4272  fileNameNode.appendChild( contentDoc.createTextNode( docFileName ) );
4273 
4274  QDomElement metadataFileNameNode = contentDoc.createElement( "MetadataFileName" );
4275  filesNode.appendChild( metadataFileNameNode );
4276  metadataFileNameNode.appendChild( contentDoc.createTextNode( "metadata.xml" ) );
4277 
4278  // If the generator can save annotations natively, do it
4279  KTemporaryFile modifiedFile;
4280  bool annotationsSavedNatively = false;
4281  if ( d->canAddAnnotationsNatively() )
4282  {
4283  if ( !modifiedFile.open() )
4284  return false;
4285 
4286  modifiedFile.close(); // We're only interested in the file name
4287 
4288  QString errorText;
4289  if ( saveChanges( modifiedFile.fileName(), &errorText ) )
4290  {
4291  docPath = modifiedFile.fileName(); // Save this instead of the original file
4292  annotationsSavedNatively = true;
4293  }
4294  else
4295  {
4296  kWarning(OkularDebug) << "saveChanges failed: " << errorText;
4297  kDebug(OkularDebug) << "Falling back to saving a copy of the original file";
4298  }
4299  }
4300 
4301  KTemporaryFile metadataFile;
4302  PageItems saveWhat = annotationsSavedNatively ? None : AnnotationPageItems;
4303  if ( !d->savePageDocumentInfo( &metadataFile, saveWhat ) )
4304  return false;
4305 
4306  const QByteArray contentDocXml = contentDoc.toByteArray();
4307  okularArchive.writeFile( "content.xml", user.loginName(), userGroup.name(),
4308  contentDocXml.constData(), contentDocXml.length() );
4309 
4310  okularArchive.addLocalFile( docPath, docFileName );
4311  okularArchive.addLocalFile( metadataFile.fileName(), "metadata.xml" );
4312 
4313  if ( !okularArchive.close() )
4314  return false;
4315 
4316  return true;
4317 }
4318 
4319 QPrinter::Orientation Document::orientation() const
4320 {
4321  double width, height;
4322  int landscape, portrait;
4323  const Okular::Page *currentPage;
4324 
4325  // if some pages are landscape and others are not, the most common wins, as
4326  // QPrinter does not accept a per-page setting
4327  landscape = 0;
4328  portrait = 0;
4329  for (uint i = 0; i < pages(); i++)
4330  {
4331  currentPage = page(i);
4332  width = currentPage->width();
4333  height = currentPage->height();
4334  if (currentPage->orientation() == Okular::Rotation90 || currentPage->orientation() == Okular::Rotation270) qSwap(width, height);
4335  if (width > height) landscape++;
4336  else portrait++;
4337  }
4338  return (landscape > portrait) ? QPrinter::Landscape : QPrinter::Portrait;
4339 }

4347 void DocumentPrivate::requestDone( PixmapRequest * req )
4348 {
4349  if ( !req )
4350  return;
4351 
4352  if ( !m_generator || m_closingLoop )
4353  {
4354  m_pixmapRequestsMutex.lock();
4355  m_executingPixmapRequests.removeAll( req );
4356  m_pixmapRequestsMutex.unlock();
4357  delete req;
4358  if ( m_closingLoop )
4359  m_closingLoop->exit();
4360  return;
4361  }
4362 
4363 #ifndef NDEBUG
4364  if ( !m_generator->canGeneratePixmap() )
4365  kDebug(OkularDebug) << "requestDone with generator not in READY state.";
4366 #endif
4367 
4368  // [MEM] 1.1 find and remove a previous entry for the same page and id
4369  QLinkedList< AllocatedPixmap * >::iterator aIt = m_allocatedPixmaps.begin();
4370  QLinkedList< AllocatedPixmap * >::iterator aEnd = m_allocatedPixmaps.end();
4371  for ( ; aIt != aEnd; ++aIt )
4372  if ( (*aIt)->page == req->pageNumber() && (*aIt)->observer == req->observer() )
4373  {
4374  AllocatedPixmap * p = *aIt;
4375  m_allocatedPixmaps.erase( aIt );
4376  m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory -= p->memory;
4377  delete p;
4378  break;
4379  }
4380 
4381  DocumentObserver *observer = req->observer();
4382  if ( m_observers.contains(observer) )
4383  {
4384  // [MEM] 1.2 append memory allocation descriptor to the FIFO
4385  qulonglong memoryBytes = 0;
4386  const TilesManager *tm = req->d->tilesManager();
4387  if ( tm )
4388  memoryBytes = tm->totalMemory();
4389  else
4390  memoryBytes = 4 * req->width() * req->height();
4391 
4392  AllocatedPixmap * memoryPage = new AllocatedPixmap( req->observer(), req->pageNumber(), memoryBytes );
4393  m_allocatedPixmaps.append( memoryPage );
4394  m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory += memoryBytes;
4395 
4396  // 2. notify an observer that its pixmap changed
4397  observer->notifyPageChanged( req->pageNumber(), DocumentObserver::Pixmap );
4398  }
4399 #ifndef NDEBUG
4400  else
4401  kWarning(OkularDebug) << "Receiving a done request for the defunct observer" << observer;
4402 #endif
4403 
4404  // 3. delete request
4405  m_pixmapRequestsMutex.lock();
4406  m_executingPixmapRequests.removeAll( req );
4407  m_pixmapRequestsMutex.unlock();
4408  delete req;
4409 
4410  // 4. start a new generation if some is pending
4411  m_pixmapRequestsMutex.lock();
4412  bool hasPixmaps = !m_pixmapRequestsStack.isEmpty();
4413  m_pixmapRequestsMutex.unlock();
4414  if ( hasPixmaps )
4415  sendGeneratorPixmapRequest();
4416 }

4418 void DocumentPrivate::setPageBoundingBox( int page, const NormalizedRect& boundingBox )
4419 {
4420  Page * kp = m_pagesVector[ page ];
4421  if ( !m_generator || !kp )
4422  return;
4423 
4424  if ( kp->boundingBox() == boundingBox )
4425  return;
4426  kp->setBoundingBox( boundingBox );
4427 
4428  // notify observers about the change
4429  foreachObserverD( notifyPageChanged( page, DocumentObserver::BoundingBox ) );
4430 
4431  // TODO: For generators that generate the bbox by pixmap scanning, if the first generated pixmap is very small, the bounding box will forever be inaccurate.
4432  // TODO: Crop computation should also consider annotations, actions, etc. to make sure they're not cropped away.
4433  // TODO: Help compute bounding box for generators that create a QPixmap without a QImage, like text and plucker.
4434  // TODO: Don't compute the bounding box if no one needs it (e.g., Trim Borders is off).
4435 
4436 }

4438 void DocumentPrivate::calculateMaxTextPages()
4439 {
4440  int multipliers = qMax(1, qRound(getTotalMemory() / 536870912.0)); // 512 MB
4441  switch (SettingsCore::memoryLevel())
4442  {
4443  case SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Low:
4444  m_maxAllocatedTextPages = multipliers * 2;
4445  break;
4446 
4447  case SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Normal:
4448  m_maxAllocatedTextPages = multipliers * 50;
4449  break;
4450 
4451  case SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Aggressive:
4452  m_maxAllocatedTextPages = multipliers * 250;
4453  break;
4454 
4455  case SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Greedy:
4456  m_maxAllocatedTextPages = multipliers * 1250;
4457  break;
4458  }
4459 }
4460 
4461 void DocumentPrivate::textGenerationDone( Page *page )
4462 {
4463  if ( !m_generator || m_closingLoop ) return;
4464 
4465  // 1. If we reached the cache limit, delete the first text page from the fifo
4466  if (m_allocatedTextPagesFifo.size() == m_maxAllocatedTextPages)
4467  {
4468  int pageToKick = m_allocatedTextPagesFifo.takeFirst();
4469  if (pageToKick != page->number()) // this should never happen but better be safe than sorry
4470  {
4471  m_pagesVector.at(pageToKick)->setTextPage( 0 ); // deletes the textpage
4472  }
4473  }
4474 
4475  // 2. Add the page to the fifo of generated text pages
4476  m_allocatedTextPagesFifo.append( page->number() );
4477 }

4484 void DocumentPrivate::setRotationInternal( int r, bool notify )
4485 {
4486  Rotation rotation = (Rotation)r;
4487  if ( !m_generator || ( m_rotation == rotation ) )
4488  return;
4489 
4490  // tell the pages to rotate
4491  QVector< Okular::Page * >::const_iterator pIt = m_pagesVector.constBegin();
4492  QVector< Okular::Page * >::const_iterator pEnd = m_pagesVector.constEnd();
4493  for ( ; pIt != pEnd; ++pIt )
4494  (*pIt)->d->rotateAt( rotation );
4495  if ( notify )
4496  {
4497  // notify the generator that the current rotation has changed
4498  m_generator->rotationChanged( rotation, m_rotation );
4499  }
4500  // set the new rotation
4501  m_rotation = rotation;
4502 
4503  if ( notify )
4504  {
4505  foreachObserverD( notifySetup( m_pagesVector, DocumentObserver::NewLayoutForPages ) );
4506  foreachObserverD( notifyContentsCleared( DocumentObserver::Pixmap | DocumentObserver::Highlights | DocumentObserver::Annotations ) );
4507  }
4508  kDebug(OkularDebug) << "Rotated:" << r;
4509 }

4511 void Document::setPageSize( const PageSize &size )
4512 {
4513  if ( !d->m_generator || !d->m_generator->hasFeature( Generator::PageSizes ) )
4514  return;
4515 
4516  if ( d->m_pageSizes.isEmpty() )
4517  d->m_pageSizes = d->m_generator->pageSizes();
4518  int sizeid = d->m_pageSizes.indexOf( size );
4519  if ( sizeid == -1 )
4520  return;
4521 
4522  // tell the pages to change size
4523  QVector< Okular::Page * >::const_iterator pIt = d->m_pagesVector.constBegin();
4524  QVector< Okular::Page * >::const_iterator pEnd = d->m_pagesVector.constEnd();
4525  for ( ; pIt != pEnd; ++pIt )
4526  (*pIt)->d->changeSize( size );
4527  // clear 'memory allocation' descriptors
4528  qDeleteAll( d->m_allocatedPixmaps );
4529  d->m_allocatedPixmaps.clear();
4530  d->m_allocatedPixmapsTotalMemory = 0;
4531  // notify the generator that the current page size has changed
4532  d->m_generator->pageSizeChanged( size, d->m_pageSize );
4533  // set the new page size
4534  d->m_pageSize = size;
4535 
4536  foreachObserver( notifySetup( d->m_pagesVector, DocumentObserver::NewLayoutForPages ) );
4537  foreachObserver( notifyContentsCleared( DocumentObserver::Pixmap | DocumentObserver::Highlights ) );
4538  kDebug(OkularDebug) << "New PageSize id:" << sizeid;
4539 }

4544 DocumentViewport::DocumentViewport( int n )
4545  : pageNumber( n )
4546 {
4547  // default settings
4548  rePos.enabled = false;
4549  rePos.normalizedX = 0.5;
4550  rePos.normalizedY = 0.0;
4551  rePos.pos = Center;
4552  autoFit.enabled = false;
4553  autoFit.width = false;
4554  autoFit.height = false;

4556 
4557 DocumentViewport::DocumentViewport( const QString & xmlDesc )
4558  : pageNumber( -1 )
4559 {
4560  // default settings (maybe overridden below)
4561  rePos.enabled = false;
4562  rePos.normalizedX = 0.5;
4563  rePos.normalizedY = 0.0;
4564  rePos.pos = Center;
4565  autoFit.enabled = false;
4566  autoFit.width = false;
4567  autoFit.height = false;
4568 
4569  // check for string presence
4570  if ( xmlDesc.isEmpty() )
4571  return;
4572 
4573  // decode the string
4574  bool ok;
4575  int field = 0;
4576  QString token = xmlDesc.section( ';', field, field );
4577  while ( !token.isEmpty() )
4578  {
4579  // decode the current token
4580  if ( field == 0 )
4581  {
4582  pageNumber = token.toInt( &ok );
4583  if ( !ok )
4584  return;
4585  }
4586  else if ( token.startsWith( "C1" ) )
4587  {
4588  rePos.enabled = true;
4589  rePos.normalizedX = token.section( ':', 1, 1 ).toDouble();
4590  rePos.normalizedY = token.section( ':', 2, 2 ).toDouble();
4591  rePos.pos = Center;
4592  }
4593  else if ( token.startsWith( "C2" ) )
4594  {
4595  rePos.enabled = true;
4596  rePos.normalizedX = token.section( ':', 1, 1 ).toDouble();
4597  rePos.normalizedY = token.section( ':', 2, 2 ).toDouble();
4598  if (token.section( ':', 3, 3 ).toInt() == 1) rePos.pos = Center;
4599  else rePos.pos = TopLeft;
4600  }
4601  else if ( token.startsWith( "AF1" ) )
4602  {
4603  autoFit.enabled = true;
4604  autoFit.width = token.section( ':', 1, 1 ) == "T";
4605  autoFit.height = token.section( ':', 2, 2 ) == "T";
4606  }
4607  // proceed tokenizing string
4608  field++;
4609  token = xmlDesc.section( ';', field, field );
4610  }
4611 }
4612 
4613 QString DocumentViewport::toString() const
4614 {
4615  // start string with page number
4616  QString s = QString::number( pageNumber );
4617  // if has center coordinates, save them on string
4618  if ( rePos.enabled )
4619  s += QString( ";C2:" ) + QString::number( rePos.normalizedX ) +
4620  ':' + QString::number( rePos.normalizedY ) +
4621  ':' + QString::number( rePos.pos );
4622  // if has autofit enabled, save its state on string
4623  if ( autoFit.enabled )
4624  s += QString( ";AF1:" ) + (autoFit.width ? "T" : "F") +
4625  ':' + (autoFit.height ? "T" : "F");
4626  return s;
4627 }

4634 bool DocumentViewport::operator==( const DocumentViewport & vp ) const
4635 {
4636  bool equal = ( pageNumber == vp.pageNumber ) &&
4637  ( rePos.enabled == vp.rePos.enabled ) &&
4638  ( autoFit.enabled == vp.autoFit.enabled );
4639  if ( !equal )
4640  return false;
4641  if ( rePos.enabled &&
4642  (( rePos.normalizedX != vp.rePos.normalizedX) ||
4643  ( rePos.normalizedY != vp.rePos.normalizedY ) || rePos.pos != vp.rePos.pos) )
4644  return false;
4645  if ( autoFit.enabled &&
4646  (( autoFit.width != vp.autoFit.width ) ||
4647  ( autoFit.height != vp.autoFit.height )) )
4648  return false;
4649  return true;
4650 }
4651 
4652 bool DocumentViewport::operator<( const DocumentViewport & vp ) const
4653 {
4654  // TODO: Check autoFit and Position
4655 
4656  if ( pageNumber != vp.pageNumber )
4657  return pageNumber < vp.pageNumber;
4658 
4659  if ( !rePos.enabled && vp.rePos.enabled )
4660  return true;
4661 
4662  if ( !vp.rePos.enabled )
4663  return false;
4664 
4665  if ( rePos.normalizedY != vp.rePos.normalizedY )
4666  return rePos.normalizedY < vp.rePos.normalizedY;
4667 
4668  return rePos.normalizedX < vp.rePos.normalizedX;
4669 }
